name: Anytime Fitness
address: Anytime Fitness, 7643 Royal Oak Ave, Burnaby, BC V5J 4K2

detailed_reviews.review_text: Visiting from California and we needed a place to workout daily. Found this gym nearby and just 5 mins walking distance. This is a great small, but mighty gym. Friendly staff, clean and well maintained equipments. Thank you Sam and John for your friendly and professional service.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jasmin! We hope you enjoy your stay here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive been a member for almost a year now with royal oak as my home gym and it does feel like home. Ive been to a lot of gyms but Anytime Fitness stands out as the most friendly, fun and challenging space there is. I cannot stress enough as to how good the environment is. Just showing up makes you want to work out and the crew is the friendliest of any gym Ive ever come across in my life. I certainly did not go wrong by choosing Anytime Fitness and i know others feel the same as me. This is what fitness should look like. Challenging, exhausting, entertaining and fun.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words! Were so grateful to hear that we feel like home. Hope to see you soon! :D

detailed_reviews.review_text: Anytime is my 2nd home. Great facility with the equipment you need to get in a great workout. Clean and bright. Never a long wait for the equipment. Von and the team are welcoming, friendly and create a great atmosphere!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ricky! Were so happy to have you here :) See you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently moved to Burnaby and was looking for a nice comfy gym to drop in for casual workouts. I tried GL and it was just too busy for me. When I visited AF, staffs helped me out for the transition and this place is so nice and chill. I didn t have to wait for an equipment at all so that s a win for me. Great location, friendly members, no horse plays, grunting, dropping weights, competitive pricing and friendly staffs. 10/10 would recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Namgoong! Were so glad youre a part of our AF community :) We hope to see you more often here!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best gym ever. The staff are always so friendly and welcoming. Definitely a great place to get in a good workout and meet new people
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Dayanara!! :) Were so glad youre a part of our gym community! See you soon!!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: What I like about this location is that, first it s clean, the staffs are friendly and I did a personal training with coach Von,I m surprised that he could tell how you want your training to be done. Either you want it hard or challenging or easy just by doing single consultation with him. Also they do have lockers that you don t need to bring your personal keys.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Bien! Were so glad that you enjoyed your experience here at the gym and with Von :) Hope to see you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym is well-organized, clean, and in good repair. When machines are out of order they are well marked and appear to be quickly repaired. The variety of exercise equipment available is quite exhaustive. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable and the trainers are both experienced and motivating. The fees are reasonable for the service provided.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Margaret! We always try our best for our members :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good selection of equipments and not too crowded. I very much enjoy that I can see how many people are at the gym on the app before coming. The toilets are actually clean too!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Lewis! Were super glad to know that the AF app has been helpful to you :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super friendly staff and environment! Always feel welcomed. Great equipment options. Fantastic place to let off some steam!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Laura! Were so glad to have you as our member :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place, very clean, with wide variety of machines and spaces for all kind of fitness activities and with kind and available personell! Super recommended!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Lorenzo! Were happy to have you here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: When I came in I was greeted by the friendliest staff. They are so welcoming and made me feel comfortable when I joined. On top of that, the facility is kept soooo clean, the sanitizing wipes are always filled and everything is very tidy. While I was working out I noticed how the trainers were so professional and really knew what they were doing. Overall, great experience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback Mohit! See you around the facility! and feel free to approach us if you have any concerns or questions. Cheers!

detailed_reviews.review_text: No doubt the best one I ve ever been part of, the staff is always friendly and willing to help you shoutout to Niko!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Jose! Hope to see you soon :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this gym! Always clean, not busy in the AM and friendly staff
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Yay, thank you Kate! Were glad you love it here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this location. It s big, open, clean with high ceiling. The staff are always super friendly and helpful from the Manager Von, down to the staffs Sam, John and Niko, but I highly recommend James as a trainer, his knowledge and experience can help people achieve their fitness goals with awesome guidance and support. I ve been to other locations and I think I ll stick to this one!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Tony! We appreciate your feedback :) Glad to have you with us!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been with anytime fitness for over 2 years nowI like the fact that they are open 24/7the gym equipment is top of the line and enough equipment that you are not waiting to get on a machine the staff are totally awesome giving advice and help where needed I have received text messages from staff asking how my workouts are going and if I need any help the atmosphere in the gym is possitive and friendly the facility is super clean with separate bathrooms with showers lots of parkingI am glad that I chose this gym for my training
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi James, thank you so much for your review! Were so happy that you chose our gym as well :) Hope to see you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super nice place even busy time you can still use free weight rack and machine. All members are like neighborhood. Especially Niko was really nice and kind. I am happy to back at homegym!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Luke! Were happy to have you here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym is open 24/7 and is very clean and spacious. Machines are in great condition. And the staff is awesome - Nikko, Von and Ethan are very helpful. I signed up for group sessions and it is worth it. I do base class with ethan, but if you are fit like goku you can sign up for build class with James ( advanced class). Overall a nice clean gym!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind feedback! Were so glad you are enjoying the team workouts :) See you at the gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is not my home gym, but I occasionally drop in because of convenience. It s very clean, well organized and facilities are pristine. Love how they offer free snacks for anyone to grab. Good key and lock storage, no need to bring your own lock. Monkey bars and big separated room with mirror for abs/stretching/Pilates. Wish they had a hip thrust machine though!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, were glad you enjoy our location! Hip thrust machine is actually on our list of new machines to get, so stay tuned :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to eat, best dim sum in the city! Jk Air conditioned, well equipped, very clean and friendly staff.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hahahahha we wish we had dim sum here! Thank you so much Will :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome   facility. They certainly take their clients safety seriously. You can see the staff spraying disinfectant promptly. There is only 28 people that can workout and it ensures safety. Best part is flexibility to work out at anytime. They have a punching bag, ropes, and others for those who want to practice some kickboxing.

Always clean gym conditions and all the members are always quiet and focus to their own work out, no one waist time at the squat machine. And I recommend the guy s name of Von who working here as a PT if you want to get PT. He is very professional and take care every students very well. Love to workout hear always
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Mingyu! We are so happy to have you as a part of our gym community! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Just started working out here. All the employees are really friendly and helpful! Lessgo!! we go gym!!

I m very anxious in public places, came here on a whim to try and get myself back to a healthy lifestyle! I m super happy so far and have been going here for nearly a year. Everyone is super nice and welcoming! They are also helpful if you have any questions, for more in depth understanding of how to properly exercise they offer training, but I ve never felt forced or pushed into doing so, if anything they want to help you achieve your goals. I m a very quiet individual normally but I have had some great conversations with Von! Grateful for this gym and the people there :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Thao! Were always happy to help our members and we are grateful to have you with us! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I luv working out in this gym. One of the bright and spacious as one could have imagined. Sam, who usually takes care of office activities always greet you with a smile when you walk in and rest of the staffs are also friendly and helpful. All machines and equipments are working well. I have seen people working out having proper gym etiquette than the other branch - such as, putting weights back, wiping down equipments. The washrooms at this branch are also much cleaner and larger than some of the other ones Ive been to. I highly recommend this gym to everyone for their fitness goal and have a experience just like a family.

I ve been with Anytime fitness for 2 years now and sometimes I go to the Royal Oak location  and I have to say   the staff is the nicest there. All Of them Are super friendly  maybe because it s a smaller one but definitely has a warmer atmosphere  i love that they have 6 squat racks and smith machine
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We absolutely love our community here and we hope you come visit us more often :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the best experience ever here!! When I came in I was greeted by the friendliest staff. They are so welcoming and made me feel so comfortable when I joined. On top of that, the facility is kept SO clean, the sanitizing wipes are always filled and everything is very tidy. While I was working out I noticed how the trainers were so professional and really knew what they were doing. Overall, great experience and I have been to a lot of gyms but this one is by far my favourite gym I have ever been to.

This is by far the best gym I ve ever been to. The staff at this location make this gym a whole other experience. It s always kept clean and organized. Everyone is so welcoming, kind, and supportive. The machines and equipment are great and are always working. I ve been to other gyms that have needle dispensaries in the washrooms, but you will definitely not find anything like that here. The members are all there for the same reason, to grow and better themselves. This is something you would expect is the norm at most gyms, but unfortunately, it s not!! I always look forward to coming to this gym and getting a workout in. If i m ever not feeling my best, my mood is quickly lifted by the friendly staff. When I first started training here, I was very shy and quiet. My main goal was to get my work out done and leave. Almost two years later and I am grateful to call these people my friends. My fitness journey would never be where it is if it weren t for these lovely people who approached me, pushed me out of my shell, and helped me gain confidence. They took the time to educate me on fitness, specifically weightlifting, and helped me when needed, with my form or a spot, etc.  They genuinely care :) That is what makes this gym different.

This is one of the better gyms I have been to in the Burnaby - BC area. Spacious layout, tons of equipment, great people, large bathrooms, and the entire place is kept clean for the most part. I miss the place and hope to be back there soon!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Carlo!  We hope you come visit us again soon :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best gym I ve been to. The equipment are fairly new and in good conditions but my favourite part about this gym are the staff because they re super friendly and inviting. They make you feel safe and comfortable while working out.

I absolutely love this gym. The equipment and building is always clean and working. Music is great and never too loud. They have everything Ive needed as far as equipment is concerned. All the staff is nice and has remembered my name in the past, even though I always forget theirs. Everyone that works there is obviously knowledgeable about fitness and can answer any questions you may have. I havent used the personal training services but I often see the personal trainers working with clients while Im at the gym and they are doing a good job as far as I can tell. Im moving soon and Im very sad to have to leave this gym behind because this location has set the standard for me.

One of the better anytimes for sure, I ve trained at 6 anytimes in the greater Vancouver area and this one is top 2! Great training environment with some of the best equipment at an anytime fitness. The manager is a topman and the staff are nice people. Can be somewhat busy during the busier times but having 6 squat racks makes a huge difference compared to most gyms
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind review Isaiah! Were honoured to be considered your top 2 anytimes in the greater Vancouver area. We hope to see you more often! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Central location - Skytrain accessible. Always pristinely clean. Multiple squat racks. Crazy number of machines available. Standing bag available for bag-work. An entire room with mirrors for stretching and mat exercises. Bunch of treadmills and elliptical machines available. Friendly and helpful staff. Sometimes they have giveaways and free treats too, like bananas. Open 24/7. Best gym I ve gone to. Can t go wrong.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! We love doing our monthly challenges and Banana Days! Come try our February challenge, its real fun :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very clean and friendly Gym supet busy at time but overall great gym

I been a member of the gym over a year now. Although I initially started my membership at another location of anytime fitness, I liked this better, and eventually became a member of this location. The gym is very clean and organized; the staff is is very friendly and attentive. They have a fair amount of equipment for such a small gym. It never feels like the stations are too contested. They remained open during covid with limited capacity which I appreciated a lot during covid.
Great place to workout, the staff is really nice and its always clean
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Joannie! We try our best to provide a clean gym for our awesome members :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive had a membership at AF for a few years now. The fact that you can access any of many location is a huge plus, as I have a location close to work and close to home. This gym in particular is equipped very well (6 squat racks!) and the staff keep it clean and enjoyable.
Equipments are great. The staffs are very helpful and nice.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had never worked out in or joined a gym before, but I decided to take the plunge. It was a bit intimidating when I walked in for my first workout, but the staff there are fantastic, very friendly and welcoming. Its a busy place with people coming and going and they do a good job enforcing the health & capacity requirements. Equipment is clean and well maintained and I have never had to wait more than about 5 minutes to get in. I decided to sign up with a personal trainer to get me on track and teach me how to use the equipment and that has gone very well. I would recommend a PT for a gym novice....its not cheap, but worth it. It has been well over a month now and I am now comfortable in a gym environment and I always look forward to my next visit. Steve
Im a new member visiting from the US, but Niko got me in right away. Super friendly and helpful over the phone and at the gym. Thanks Niko.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review Scott! Welcome to our gym :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Awesome gym. Started coming here from the Richmond location and the new renovated location is great! Free lockers, showers and lots of new equipment and toys. Staff is very friendly and helpful and frequently cleans equipment. I definitely feel safe and effective at this gym. Planning to come here for a long time! Recommend for anyone whos looking for a nice convenient option and a great fitness community.

This is a the best gym that I have been!! It is really close to my home and a very convienient spot  . The staffs are friendly and they offer personal training for the good price. I highly recommend here because it is super clean and chill.

Friendly & knowledgeable staff and trainers and great facility! I have been training with Von for a while and he is really great at giving tips and tricks to maximize the results of my work out. I highly recommend this gym & location.
Good staff. The environment here is completely good and clean. A club u must come
Signed up a month ago, payed in full for a while year and couldnt be happier with my desicion. Great quality equipment and the facility is well maintained. Also very friendly staff :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Nicolas! We are happy that you are happy with your decision :) See you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Started working out at this location last Dec, it was a crazy time for social distancing and hygiene but the staff kept everything nice and clean, not to mention they re the most polite and friendly staff I have ever met. Equipments r always clean and various in weight so u can progress urself steadier. Above and beyond, I ll definitely live at this beautiful if I can

Equipment is new and well maintained. Very clean atmosphere. Bathrooms are always clean. Good location, right next to Buy Low. The staff at this location are all very friendly and professional. They did a great job staying organized and enforcing regulations around covid and social distancing. There is always plenty of disinfectant and sanitizing wipes available and the staff are very encouraging of safety and protocol.

Best gym with the best staff. This gym has tons of racks and I find myself not waiting very long to use one during peak hours. This gym is always clean and well maintained. Very proud to call this my home gym

Our team at ACTIVE RELEAF Wellness decided it was time for all of us to get a gym pass. I am super happy with our choice we made with Anytime Fitness, especially this Royal Oak location. Staff is very friendly, I have already had one personal trainer session with Michael which was great! Lots of free weights and machines to choose from, looking forward to the gym has a new meaning, thanks everyone!
Great experience with Von Pt so far. Good facility with lots of equipment available.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Marilyn! Were so glad that youre enjoying your personal training sessions with Von :) Hope to see you soon!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been here since it opened. Great gym with lots of equipment. Best of all the hours I dont have to try and make it to the gym before they close because they never close. They are open to suggestions on what new equipment to buy with the annual maintenance fee. They recently moved to a new location still in the area and got more space and equipment. Still a great gym with great atmosphere management.
Like my trainer. I like the look of the studio. It s very clean, high quality, equipments in great condition and conveniently located. All staff are friendly.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words Evan! Were glad to have you here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Anytime Fitness Metrotown Royal Oak is an awesome gym, it is spacious, bright and all of the members are very respectful & conscientious of sharing the equipment; I am part of the 4:00 am morning crowd and can assure you the gym gets clean everyday. All the staff and personal trainers are great.  My  favorite area of the gym and selling point is the functional fitness area ; they have sandbags, kettlebells, battle ropes, tires, sled, power racks, bumpers plates, etc. They also have the standard machines, free weights, racks and cardio area; I highly recommend this gym

I came in at 4 am and the person in charge of cleaning was doing an excellent job. All the areas were clean, the washrooms were in excellent conditions of use. I want to give my congratulations to this guy because it is very nice to find a gym so clean and tidy at this time of the morning. Congratulations    he is doing an awesome job.

This gym is AWESOME! I have worked out other gyms in the past and none compare to this one.  This is a safe and fun gym.  Everyone is respectful and kind.  Even though the gym can get busy at night it seems that everyone is respectful of using the equipment and sharing it when needed.  The gym is well kept, clean and organized.  The staff is very friendly and approachable, even though they have a lot of clients they find time in their day to have conversations with them before, after and during the clients workouts.  There is nothing I can really complain about, this is a top notch gym that I have recommended to my friends and still recommend to people looking for a good gym.  So far I have gotten a few friends to sign up and like me they have nothing but good things to say about this gym!

Gym: Clean, safe, easy access. Staff: Friendly, love their job, welcoming, and easily approachable. Patrons: Between 12pm-2pm, the people working out are nice, friendly, and follow COVID-19 rules. I recommend this gym to everyone.

Friendly staff, great facilities. Even though it is a smaller gym, it never feels like I have to wait for equipment and its always clean. You get two free personal training sessions and the trainers seem like they are really focused on customising a workout to suit you. Ive given up on a lot of gym memberships before but this place is great for someone like me who just wants a quieter solo place to get in shape.

Anytime Fitness is the best gym. The staff are always very friendly and they always greet you with a smile on their faces. The staff are always walking around to make sure the environment is safe and clean for everyone. The equipment in the gym is all still very new and is maintained in great condition. The members are also very friendly and like to keep the equipment clean as well. I would HIGHLY recommend this gym to everyone. Thanks to the Anytime fitness team for the best gym experience.
Recently renovated ! Everything is clean and tidy. Love this place :)

The gym is small i will admit that the staff is super friendly. Each trainer is resrespectable and offer assistance with there various area of speacialty. Gym is clean well kept. Washrooms are a struggle sometimes due to the busy hours but it is understandable. Overall a very positive friendly comfortable environment to train in. Even the other patrons  in the gym are friendly and provide a great vibe a d environment to train in.

Staff was very friendly. And the facilities were great and clean, new equipments as well! lots of squat racks compared to most gyms. Thanks to one of the personal trainers Von for helping me out with ny program as a beginner!
Perfect gym with all the necessary equipment and friendly staff. Monthly challenges to win prizes and cute little stuff like free bananas once a week!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you George! Were happy that you enjoy our monthly challenges and our weekly member appreciation snack days :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Well maintained and it feels like I never have to wait for equipment! They have 6 squat racks which is amazing. The staff and management do a great job of managing the capacity restrictions due to Covid. Far better than other gyms in the area I have tried!

Ive been going to anytime fitness (Metrotown)for a few years and hands down my favourite gym. Clean, pretty good gym equipment and amazing staff. Especially with covid the staff has gone and beyond to keep it a safe place thank you! High recommend!!
Perfect place to work out Specially this location is pretty friendly and quiet Niko is great manager Thank you to give me wonderful time to have exercise there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! Were grateful to have you here :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I really enjoy it here. The staffs are all super nice and patient. The environment is great as well. Definitely recommend to come and work out here.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Qiwen! Thank you for your kind words :) Were so glad to have you as a part of our gym community!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great location, very friendly staff. Equipment is pretty well laid out, and fairly new. Sanitization is on point. I enjoy working out here, the washrooms are always kept clean!

The staff is always very welcoming and nice! The place is clean and staff makes sure that members and staff are following the rules of disinfecting and highly reccomend wearing a mask when not doing cardio. Depending on the time you go (6-7 pm), do expect a lineup since theyre trying to make sure theres only around 28 people inside.
Great gym, well maintained, great equipment, very friendly trainers they are very helpful and professional. If you re looking for a gym, I would highly recommend this place.

I ve been a member since 2014 and I love this gym. The staff are nice and friendly. The gym is always clean. I love that there s hand sanitizers everywhere and plexiglass in between the cardio machines. It has all the equipment I need for my workouts.

Well maintained gym, free of attitudes and judgements. Helpful staff and many programs designed for those who just want a simple workout to others who want something more intensive. Highly recommended.

Anytime fitness Royal Oak is a great gym. Its a big one so social distancing is very possible. They provide wipes to clean out the equipments!! I like every part of this gym. Having 6 power racks is a heaven for me cuz I dont have to wait. The only thing I dont really enjoy is the lighting in the bathrooms lol. The old metro branch had better bathroom lighting. Beside this fact, all good 100%. I am happy with the price too :) People are super cool and friendly.
My favourite location! Clean facility and friendly staff.  Has a good variety of equipment and are well maintained. 6 squat racks are a huge plus and I never have to wait to use the equipment. :)

Fantastic gym! open 24 hours, close to everything. lots of equipment! there is separate room for ab workout so I dont embarrass myself with the gym bros. Everyone there is friendly. Staff member that works out at 11PM still very helpful even though he is off duty.

Awesome gym! Been going to this location for roughly two or so years now as its close to my office. Always clean, very friendly staff, and even though its a small gym, Ive never had to wait for equipment. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a gym in the area.

This is a nice little gym. I always go in the morning as its not busy. I have never seen more than 10 people using the facilities. Most of the time there are about 4-5 people. Staff members and personal trainers are friendly. Plenty of locker space, 3 shower/bathrooms. Fitness classes in the mornings and evenings. Membership pricing is fair, and if theres something wrong, they will try to fix it. I havent encountered those stereotypes  where gym will try to upsell you or refuse to cancel membership. Contracts are fair, as long as you go by the contract, they dont give you hard time. Ive been with this gym since it opened in 2013.
Great staff here. Very good communication provided from staff. Staff are friendly and always there to help. One of the cleanest locations around me. Good variety of equipment. 5 stars

The reasons I like this fitness club: 1) Safe. 2) Convenient. Work out anytime. 3) Clean.  Staff are always maintaining the place.  Other members are tidy. 4) Latest and greatest stuff. 5) Efficient work out - just the right size gym to do what you have to do, everything is where you need it to be. 6) Awesome staff and owners. 7) Access to other Anytime Fitness clubs around the city too. Its great! Recommended!

Looking to start your fitness journey and living in Burnaby. This is the right place. Everything is great about this facility. Great people, great resources to work with and great environment. Visit the location and you ll realize that everything I mentioned here is true. There is a lot more that you ll see with time.

I give them 4.5 out of 5 star for being open 24/7. Unlike other gym there open to members all the time so you wont have to beat the rush hour wait  in time for equipments  the location itself is easily  accessible  and  hes free parking lot  shops its near malls metro town and crystal mall, shops  (Shoppers,save on, restaurant. You can do your chores before after working out.

Great gym, clean and updated equipment, well kept washrooms, and the staff are nice. Prices are good for location and convenience, and the gym is rarely busy besides the after work peak times on weekdays. Definitely recommended!
It is a clean, organized and new gym with a really good design to do function training. The staffs are very friendly as well. I am really happy with this location!!
Proud to go there to workout, gym staff is more than friendly and willing to help you with any issue you have in there!
We came from Kelowna to stay in Vancouver and this gym was very pleasant. A bit on the smaller size but very clean and the staff was extremely friendly.
Super friendly and supportive staff. Very clean gym. Love coming here.

My to go to gym since 2013. I enrolled my brother and my wife as well and was never disappointed. Sam, one of the staff is always there to help and treats everyone like they are royalty. Clean equipment , all in great condition

Have been going here for years. They are open to members all the time so you will not need to beat the rush hour. Price is affordable compared to other gyms. The location itself is easily accessible and has ample free parking lot. Plenty of shops nearby including Metropolis and Crystal Mall.
Friendly and welcoming environment! Very bright and clean workout space! The staff are present and attentive. Great selection of equipment! Good social distancing in place!

Very good experience. Happy with my choice and decision to stay with this gym. Very friendly and helpful. Staff here is great. Better than most gyms Ive been too. A very convenient gym with its location.

This gym is beyond good. Before the pandemic they were amazing, but since the pandemic they ve gotten even BETTER. The staff ALWAYS have a huge smile and are willing to help with pretty much anything.

Anytime fitness is truly a member-friendly gym. The members are all so respectful, the trainers are also very friendly and will help you if needed, and the ownership really has provided an amazing atmosphere for ANYBODY who wants to get fit at their own time (the gym is 24/7). A place where you can make friends and get fit doing so? You better sign up quick or the gym will run out of space!

I enjoy working out at this Anytime Fitness. First of all Anytime Fitness is awesome because you can use any Gym in the world with thier memebership 24 hours a day. This is a great location, I have been to about 50 of them. There is ample free parking, it is close to the Skytrain and it is always clean. The staff is helpful and nice to work with. I recommend this location to anyone.

Brand new location   appreciate that they have a floor work out room here and a space that incorporates boxing and tire workouts. I also give the management two thumbs up for ensuring they re following Covid-19 regulations, they consistently disinfect equipment every hour.

Been coming here for a year, and this small gym does more than enough to accommodate you. Friendly staff that goes the extra mile to help you, regularly cleaned equipment. The 24 hour availability is just icing on the cake.
This gym is clean and staff is super friendly. It really gives you a relaxed feeling when working out here. The equipment is new and they have everything you need to get your beach body ready
I ve been a member for close to a year now and Royal Oak is one of my favourite locations to do my work out at. It s one of the bigger gyms with lots  of space to stretch, cross train and lift.
Very good environment. Staffs are very friendly and helpful. It s a clean gym. They have good work out equipments and well maintained.

I have been training in the anytime fitness gym for a year and I am delighted. They have everything you need to train and lots of group classes. The best of all is the treatment they give you from minute 1. You can see the experience of many years.
Absolutely FANTASTIC! Everyone should go here every day! Private showers are spotless, machines are clean and everyone is super nice! Very close to my house.

The 24*7 useability to the gym provides you an edge to be performing your exercises as planned. Its in a good vicinity allowing you to grab a healthy sandwich at the subway near by. Good amount of equipments for full body workout. Good number of trademills. Always available to use. Bathroom are always clean and hygienic. Rest said if you really wish to workout you have it all in here. Cheers !!
Nice gym, not crowded even when at full capacity which is 28 people. Usually don t have to wait but even then, it s not longer than 10 minutes. Very nice staff.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Between 5 pm to 10 pm is extremely busy, and the sauna for men doesn t work. Staff are friendly, group classes are great, cleanness is perfect.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your rating and feedback with our team Atena.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice clean facility, good selection of equipment and great Fitness classes. It even has a private womens area
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your review and feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good service I love their massage  chair. Big gym lo e working out sign up for ur 3 days trail
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 stars and for being part of the GoodLife community! See you for your next workout.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The space is great,I use it since 2016. If you like sauna its always broken, the place try to keep it running, but some people cant understand water in the resistance does not work.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to reach out and share your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your support and will have management review accordingly.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a great experience with a trainer here. Trainer asked for my workout goal and time frame, constructed a solid work out routine, along with many knowledgeable fitness tips during the sessions. Trainer does not waste time on any routines that I do not prefer. Each workout session was great, fun and fried from him pushing the max out of me. Really recommend Joseph the trainer here. Solid guy. Gym itself is great. Lots of facilities. But may get crowded during rush hours.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your Review and letting us know about your experience with Personal Training. Were so happy to hear that Joseph was able to help you on your Fitness Journey. :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: If you like crazy busy gyms and stalking people for their machines, then this is the gym for you. I stay at the Element hotel every month for work and I use this Goodlife because its conveniently in the same building. I wish the drop in fee wasnt so much, but I was given some free entries, so I cant complain. I like the staff and lots of fit people.

I have been working out this gym since 2020 . The most difficult time during the COVID . I remember That time only limited members allowed one hour to work out .  Everybody was kind nervous and must wear the masks all the time . But everyone was working out hard and kind of feeling strong and positive . Really appreciate this gym kept opening during covid .  Thank God that the COVID is ended . Personally I really love this gym as it s big and modern plus The facilities are great . Staffs are very friendly... especially the coaches..I also introduced a male friend of mine to the gym and he bought one year personal training with the coach Louis . And I introduced another female friend to joined the gym to I have One suggestion   that hope the owner can read it . ( I suggested managers several times but not working . ) . If this gym has the rule ( No Heavy weights smashing ) that May help this gym environment in a safer . harmony . and may help the business grow. My suggestion is Please put a Sign ( don t drop weights heavily) next to the all weights areas that I saw in other gyms has it which is really help . Please let the stafffs especially the sales team Educate all new members + old members should drop the weights carefully not drop the weights very heavily that can make a huge noise and the floor is shaking . This second floor is standing so much  massive weighs include the hundreds heavy metal machines and heavy weights . Plus the busy crowd . How much weights total are in this gym ? I m worrying about mostly because it s on Second floor not on the ground . I will never worry about this issue if it s on the ground floor . I really don t like the some clients smash the weights so loudly which is hurting others ears   and feelings as well .. please support me if anyone saw my suggestion here that you are thinking sane as me . Peace   and love
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for an amazing 5 star review! We can definitely help pass along your concerns regarding the noise level at the club for our team to review. We appreciate having you as a member and hope you enjoy your next workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place for a workout with a lot of machines and weights available. Lockers are very spacious and their virtual reality cardio room is pretty cool.
Huge space and good facilities , only if they could control the prices . but amazing place to workout
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This place has an inviting atmosphere No mater what fitness level you are,you feel comfortable and positive. The facility are nice and clean. Please schedule more RPM and body pump
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this excellent rating and feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I can say nothing but good things about this place. Went in to inquire about membership.  Had a tour of the facility.  I cannot fathom Bonnie Henrys reasons for closing gyms. The entire gym was sparkling clean. You could tell that very high standards are kept in place here. The two staff members I reacted with were fantastic. I came away with everything I needed to know.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review and feedback Doug! Were happy to hear about your positive experience visiting the club and we hope to welcome you back sometime soon for a workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym went back to  the 24 hours schedule for three weeks and now they cancelled again. I was waiting the 24 hours schedule during all the pandemic. I love this gym cause its near at 10 minutes from home and 10 from my work, I start to work at 6 am on the morning everyday with no specific end timing usually 7pm. The last three weeks I was on the gym at 4:00am (my only time possible) with a couple people around. Perfect for the circuits and bi series of workout talking about the machines and everything. Thats impossible in the weekdays on rush hours. Everyone knows that the workouts its different for each person so I think some people have different needs including to reach their goals muscle gain, losing weight etc. Thats why the 24 hours could works too and with less people around its safer than the rush hours.  Im thinking to going today and cancel my membership and going to another one with the 24/7 hours service. Anyway Im a simple person who lose 40 kgs 12 years ago trying to keep and maintain his weight. My two cents.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this feedback with us Carlos. We hope to resume 24 hour operations in the future. We appreciate your patience and support.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I switched from a different gym recently because I wanted to go to a 24 hour gym. The staff has been amazing! I have loved my experience so far. When I signed up I was told  a lot of great things about the gym. I didn t expect much but I m happy to say it has all been true so far. The gym is well maintained and the atmosphere is awesome and encouraging. I have been exceeding my goals and hope to continue to do so!
Nice club, helpful staff. MaSSAGE CHAIRS are the bomb!!!! Changing rooms are top notch. Hoping to see more GoodLife clubs around the Vancouver area!

Tristan was very helpful, I was looking for the  component as an attachment for the dual pulley rowing machine equipment, Tristan was able to locate it for me, it was indeed an excellent  customer service.

The gym has a great atmosphere and all the equipment is new. If anything is broken. It is usually fixed within a couple days. The staff is really friendly. The general manager (Ben) is really helpful every time i visit. I love working out at this gym and would highly recommend it to anyone.
Great gym. Spacious and has everything you need.

Love this gym! Been going to GoodLife for 5 years now, and couldnt be happier! The staff is always super friendly and welcoming. If youre looking for a gym in Burnaby, even if you live in Vancouver, this one is worth the drive!

This gym is beyond good. Before the pandemic they were amazing, but since the pandemic theyve gotten even BETTER.The staff is so on top of making sure to clean , enforce the masks and cleaning. The staff ALWAYS have a huge smile and are willing to help with pretty much anything. I dont even see them as workers at the gym, everyone here is a friend. Theyre so welcoming and helpful if you want to join a gym do yourself a favour and join good life Metrotown. They have some of the best employees ive ever met anywhere not only at a gym. Ilona, Stephen and the whole team are AMAZING cant rave about everyone here enough!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing in depth, 5 star review Nick! Were always happy to hear of the amazing job the associates are doing at the club for our members and were lucky to have you as a member! We wish you all the best on your fitness goals here at the club

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym. Awesome Staff. Jared is the man, went above and beyond to show me around and make me feel welcome. Keep up the good work! Thanks
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I signed up for the premium ($56) plan and Im very satisfied. The business is opened 24/7, has brand new fitness equipment, good variety and number of machines (no line-ups) and very decent change rooms. My wife also signed up and she could find a good variety of classes, all included in the premium plan. One cool thing about the classes is that, if youre unable to attend to one of the scheduled times, you can play video instructions on the rooms wall projector at any time. This is a very spatious place and, in addition to the common area, there is also an area for personal training, and a workout area for women only (although many of them prefer to use the common area because it has a better variety of machines). After my first week, I dont have one single reason to complain about it.

Its the best gym hands down that I have been to, huge selection of free weights(more then any other gym), has alot of different machines, I got good service when I was wanting a membership. I didnt wait 45 minutes to get a membership like people say, and for the guy who said they wouldnt accept your cash, well it states that right on their website so do some research before you falsely accuse them of not accepting your cash.

It was my first time at this gym in a long time and the first time since the COVID-19 crisis.  Im super impressed with how the staff is handling the situation.  The gym is also huge so plenty of space to workout without having anyone in your way.

One of the best gym in canada. Staff is amazing. Last but not least Ben (general manager) is one of the best guy on this planet. He is always looking forward to help members out, no matter how busy he is. Love this gym.

Great gym. Lots of space and equipment. Tons of cardio equipment and different weight machines and free weights. Dumbbells up to 100lbs. Multiple squat racks and deadlift platforms. Very clean and staff are very friendly. The locker rooms are more like a hotels with shampoo and body wash in each shower stall. Has a co-ed main gym as well as a womens only seperate section accessed through the womens locker room. Massive spin class room and even bigger room with a screen for group fitness and yoga classes. And a great location a block from Metrotown mall and a couple blocks from the skytrain station. And very affordable in terms of memberships

Great Staff and place to workout. Hope they get wifi soon.. UPDATED ON OCTOBER 16, 2018.... Some time ago I put great staff and place to workout, things have changed. The old staff is gone which is understandable as people tend to move on, the place is now starting to show lack of maintenance on the equipment, the washrooms are not being cleaned and they still have no wifi.  My husband and I have decided to cancel our membership as were paying $120.00 per month for what? When we went to the front counter to speak about cancelling, the woman said ok and she proceeded to cancel. No questions like, may I ask if there is anything I can do to change your mind or assist you with, just a simple ok. Our membership expires in November which we are going to check out places like Steve Nash, Anytime Fitness and other places. The only staff member there is the person who signed us up is Jared. Maybe we should reach out to him but we feel now the damage is done. Goodlife fitness, retaining your clients, keeping the place clean, up with the maintenance and give the dam wifi like you have used as your sales pitch may keep your members and bring in even more. Everything about this post is true, so what excuses or lies are you prepared to give.... Yours Truly Davi and Marc

The nicest gym in the area, clean facility, towels available, the most friendly staff, reasonable pricing on personal training and memberships, and parking isn t a problem compared to other gyms. It may be busy in the gym, but I don t find that a problem; people generally don t mind if you work in with them. ~~~~~ They also offer physio and chiro, and if you are looking for a physio, ask to see Clarence Wong!!! I saw him for IMS/Dry Needling two days ago. He is super outgoing, professional, and gets the job done quick and well. I ve seen other physios before and he is by far the best. I will definitely go back to see him for all of my future physio needs  :) 5/5.
Parking in the merchant parking area in P2 is very convenient. Remember to validate your parking in the gym! Gym is very nice - one of the nicest Ive been to.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful feedback and amazing rating James!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Its a busy but clean gym.  I moved from another gym to this one because its so huge and has great classes.  When I got injured and couldnt go to the gym for awhile they put a hold on my membership without any issues. Definitely recommend this location. :)

This gym has a studio that you can use for no extra cost to your membership. Its really good if you want to do your own personal cardio away from everyone else in the gym. Definitely recommend this gym!

Awesome fitness center. Mark is a professional trainer that is friendly and know what he is doing. He put me with an excellent trainer after my check-up who is excellent too, they are helping me getting back on track with my nutrition, mood, and shape. I have checked a lot of different places where price where way higher but with poor trainers or poor facility. Steve Nash cant compete against GoodLife and many other dont get to their ankles...
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing your experience, Ralph! Were happy you are enjoying your personal training sessions and that we can be a part of your fitness journey.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Probably the best gym in Burnaby. Has everything you need. There are plenty of classes. Has a bicycle room and a studio. Sauna is included of course. Full members can also bring a +1 so it can be perfect for a couple that goes together.
I have two favourite gyms in Canada...this is one of them. Exceptional service, good equipment, great atmosphere, great staff. Thank you.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing 5-star review, Tara! Were appreciate knowing the club is one of your favorite locations, and we hope to welcome you back soon for another great workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: good service and nice stuff, lots of things to use. But got too many people and kind expensive member fees. Otherwise is all good.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ben & the team at Burnaby Sovereign are fantastic! They not only run a very welcoming gym but they also support youth events in our community. A big thank you for your recent generous donation to our track clubs fundraiser.

Having an awesome time at GoodLife fitness Burnaby.if youre looking for a welcoming atmosphere with state-of-the-art equipment look no further than GoodLife fitness Burnaby. For all of your fitness needs and anyone looking to take their fitness to the next level see my friend Tami and get yourself set up, many thanks Jerry :-)

When I was living in Vancouver I used to work out at Goodlife Fitness Burnaby, I always liked to work out there and how the staff treated me, and also the manager Max was super kind and attentive to me. Good luck Guys!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating and review Daniel!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Exemplary staff member: I came to a piece of equipment and the previous guy didnt wipe it down, despite COVID-19 policies. Honestly, I expected that sometimes, and I wouldve just wiped it myself. One staff saw this, and set the example by making this person come back and wipe it down. Couldnt ask for better diligence!

Visiting Van and attended thus GL. Very spacious and clean Goodlife. Very friendly staff. Womens Only is often old equipment and cramped for space, but this is the nicest Womens Only I think Ive seen in the country.
Great facilites and staff with free parking. Always clean but it gets really busy during rush hours. Biggest drawback (for me at least) in this gym is there is no WiFi whatsoever.

One of the most well maintained and well equipped gym in the city...its great to see the separate women section with proper training materials.. parking is at P2 level which is free provided you register your vehicle at the gym entrance.. Showers and washrooms are almost always clean ..overall nice and relaxing environment....
Pretty convenient. Can register your car for free parking. I like that you have to book for an appointment to limit the amount of people in there at once
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful rating and review Nikki! Your support means the world to us!

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review, Mark! We appreciate t he kind words regarding Hamzas helpfulness and we hope to welcome you back soon for a great workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of my favourite GoodLife fitness clubs. Staff are super friendly. Lots of room to get a stretch in, work out, have a yoga session and relax post your work out!

I really enjoy Kates bootcamp every Tuesday and Thursday at 930am. Its like a small group personal training session (2-5 ppl) of HIIT type workouts with equipment and body weight exercises. Its $200 for 12 sessions and well worth it.

Jean and Clarence from LifeMark provided excellent physiotherapy treatment 10/10 would reccomend! Definitely worth my trip out of Richmond to be treated. Great to be located inside a gym and Jean was able to assess and perscribe exercises for selfcare.
My Fave gym with the best facilities! I love the Body Jam Class, get the ultimate package a go, you wouldn t regret it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Have been to at least a dozen gyms in the van/Burnaby area and this is by far the best. Excellent equipment in perfect condition, lots of room, friendly/helpful staff

Love this location! Staff is awesome and knowledgeable, trainers are very good, it does get busy during peak times but that s just cause everyone wants to go there because of  how good it is ;) 5/5!!!
This Gym has everything I am looking for,  it has  all the equipment to keep my fitness goals in check! lots of squat racks, good classes and its own spin studio - saves me money on soulcycle lol
They have day passes for $15 CAD. The gym is perfect size and they have a variety of classes to choose. Very clean and well kept.
Out of all the gyms I ve been to and had memberships at, this is the best. 5/5 my perfect workout environment

Great gym with impeccably clean conditions, amazing facilities.The dry sauna and the massage chairs are worth a membership alone.
Best gym in burnaby! Open 24/7. Loads of equipment/ virtual spinning/ yoga classes. Very clean .

name: Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam
address: Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam, 1950 Oxford Connector, Port Coquitlam, BC V3B 4H3

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds Gym PoCo is a great gym, I love the layout and the fact that there s a women s only space. Simon was my personal trainer for 3 months and he was the absolute best (I would recommend him a 1000 times. Very professional, funny, very knowledgeable, gets the job done with minimal injury. I experienced amazing increase in strength and fitness within the 3-month period. Everyone is nice and helpful. Loving it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Moji. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! So glad youre crushing your fitness goals and feeling stronger due to your sessions with Simon! Excited to see what you can accomplish next with him!  - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was blown away by the customer service I received when I first came in with my sister as a guest. Cole showed us around the entire gym letting us know what Golds gym had to offer in PoCo. From the welcoming community to the outstanding customer service, the gym had everything I needed to do my full week workout rotation. Something not many gyms I ve been to have. 5/5 would recommend asking for Cole for the tour!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Winston. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there s anything we can help you with, please don t hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gold s is always good, but the staff here are great. Always good vibes. Paolo gave me so much helpful information to help me with my fitness goals. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Feria. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I m going to Gold s gym for a long time like four years. There s a lot of useful equipment you may use   The crews are very nice and the equipments are well maintained. If you dont know how to use them you may ask the trainers. I recommend this gym to anyone who cares about health and wellness.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Behzad. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Kindly, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been coming here for personal training with Kiefer for about a few weeks now and I ve been very happy with his work. He knows what to work on with me and provides me with tips and feedback so overall I m really happy with this gym.

Great location that is easy to access from the highway. The staff were friendly upon arrival and were happy to show me around. They have a good atmosphere that makes you feel very comfortable. The facilities were new and clean. I can say the same about the equipment. They also have a steam room and an infrared sauna in the change room for after workout. The also have massive TVs if the game is on. I really enjoyed my workout here.

This gym is amazing. There is so much to offer from free weights to Olympic weights and machines you can get any type of workout done here. Also I must say this place is kept up very well and felt very clean. Ruba the manager was a great help getting us set up here and can t wait to get more workouts in at this location.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Troy. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: From my first visit I ve felt comfortable here. The facility is clean and the staff are friendly. I had an orientation and fitness assessment with Paolo, it was such a great experience that I booked personal training sessions with Paolo. He has been a great help on my weight loss journey.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Brad. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is by far the best gym in the area. I joined in January and have been training with Lucas, who is one of the personal trainers. Lucas is a very knowledgeable and effective personal trainer, who has helped me shape up and gain strength. His training techniques are highly effective and results-oriented. He practices what he preaches and motivates you with his positive demeanour. I highly recommend him. The local management team is also great, as they are always willing to help and motivate you. Always good vibes.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Omar. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the PoCo gold s gym.  Gym is always clean and staff are very friendly.  Gym equipment are state of the art. detailed_reviews.review_text: I have recently rejoined Golds Gym Port Coquitlam after over 4 years of not much exercise. I was concerned how I would be viewed as I have gained a lot of weight since the break from gym due to my accident.  I was putting off joining gym again as I was embarrassed about how I now looked. I set up an appointment with Ruba to find out about joining again.  Ruba was super friendly, knowledgeable, and so kind.  I was put at ease as there was no judgement.  While there I saw a lot of other members of staff who remembered and greeted me.  They were super kind.  Ruba then made an appointment for my free personal training session with Paolo. As soon as I met Paolo I knew that he would be very helpful in my path to getting back to the way I was before the accident.  He is very patient, kind and explains what each exercise benefits are in a fun way.  He also adjusted each exercise according to my mobility limitations. I feel positive I will get to my goal of how I was before the accident. I am truly grateful to Golds for putting me back on track.  Even though it might take a while.  I am motivated by Paolo and I am trying hard to get there again. I really appreciate all the kindness and positive encouragement I have been given.  I will work till I achieve my goal of getting back to how I was before.  Happy, Healthy, and Strong. Thank you so much for your help with my journey. Carolyn Liebenberg The attached picture is how I looked before the accident, and it is my goal to get back there again.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Carolyn. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym Port Coquitlam. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve had a gold gym member for a few years now . I have to say I only use their classes . Their instructors are amazing Kim and Lisa. Gold gym have been very flexible with holding your membership during Covid time so I give them credit for that for sure . They also have many promotions and my favourite is offering same price of my membership to my friends ( you can t beat that). My membership is 23 bucks per month. You can t get better deal than that - 24 hours gym workout and including these classes . Great atmosphere when you get in there and love to see all ages taking care of themselves

Love Golds Gym , I feel very safe working out, love the fact that everyone gets a disinfectant spray bottle to take while you use equipment  ,  staff are also spraying down all the equipment regularly. The staff are so kind and helpful, always greeted with a smile  . Good morning by your name , and a have a good day   when I leave  I am Very happy to be a Golds Gym member .

This is a great gym in every aspect. First of all, the staff is very welcoming. Everytime you walk into the gym, the workers greet you very well despite how early or late it is. I only first saw her about 3-4 months ago but when I started making small talk with her, she gave me super chill vibes and is approachable.  Very kind and makes golds a welcoming place. Now I make sure to say hello to her whenever I can. There s also cole who I can laugh and talk with at the gym. There s also Christina who always asks me how I am when I walk in. She will also remember who you are because she prioritizes customer service. Basically the environment is very friendly because of the staff and members. Anyone who is new to lifting shouldn t be afraid to come work out here. The equipment is also great. Whenever machines need to be fixed, it will be taken care of within 3-5 days.
