I ve been to numerous gyms over the years and hands down my favourite I been lifting for 20+ years..
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback and review! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience with us so far and have been enjoying the equipment and space. We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: We have been members for over 3 years.  We have no complaints, staff is great, gym is well kept and during covid we have felt safe following all guidelines required.  Plenty of space and a wide variety of equipments.  Highly recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Super happy Milly, its an honour to have you at our Golds gym Coquitlam location!  Were proud to be Coquitlams top gym.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ruba made me feel so comfortable joining Golds and everyone is friendly and welcoming. I am enjoying the top-notch equipment, womens space, and yoga classes as well! Thank you!

I have been a member since Golds Poco has opened and was super impressed back then and even more now since COVID. The staff is so amazing, they are always making sure everyone is happy and safe. I am always so impressed with the cleanliness during my workouts and that there is always someone waving and saying hi to make me feel at home. There is no reason to not absolutely love this gym!!!

Its been six months since I came here. This place has pretty good facility and trainners (especially ,Mathew) He makes me feel good whenever i go there ,which is getting stronger and refresher on my body. He is professional, friendly and always willing to help you out if you need it. I strongly recommend a personal trainer,Mathew. I really like gold gym

Great overall experience!! Everyone is really friendly and willing to help. Joel as a GM is always there to help, Jean is just a wealth of information to help you with your diet, and motivation. If you need a trainer to get you to your goal Nicole Wong I would have to say is one of the best she will definitely get the most out of you. I would definitely recommend Golds Gym Poco to anyone!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Steve! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community. We will be sure to let Joel, Jean, Nicole and the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been going to this gym since it opened and I love it there. Good equipment, tons of classes if thats what your into, and they offer free boot camps on Saturdays which is always fun and a good way to challenge yourself. The staff are really friendly and helpful especially Sam who always makes me feel welcome the minute I walk in the door. The trainers are really good too. Ive been training with Paolo for just over a month now and the amount of progress & improvement I have seen in myself is unbelievable. Hes helped me a lot to improve my fitness level and I dont think my gym performance would be anywhere near where it is today without him. Plus he makes workouts fun and not boring. Overall this gym is great and has tons to offer.

I ve been going to this gym since September after Steve Nash Fitness Clubs closed and rebranded. The Gold s staff is super welcoming and friendly and the gym is super clean! Their covid protocol has been amazing. I feel very safe going to the gym during this pandemic.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Trish! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment, we will be sure to let the whole team know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been at Golds Gym Poco for almost a year, and have loved it! The staff is amazing, especially front desk! Very clean, making me feel safe during the pandemic! I would definitely recommend to anyone!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Kasia, we love being your top Coquitlam gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been a member at Golds Gym Poco since the start. I have had nothing but a positive experience at this gym the staff and owners are extremely friendly and personable. Up until recent with the surge of COVID there has been some stigma around safety at gyms and I would have to say this Poco golds gym is very cautious and careful around safety protocol and making sure to implement all safety measures to make not only the members feel safe but the staff as well. I really love coming to golds gym and will continue to be a long term member for the foreseeable future.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kevin! We are happy to have you as a valued member over the years. We are glad that you continue enjoy the environment and community here. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have a experience  PT program  at Port Coquitlam Gold  Gym with Erica. She is super outstanding professional trainer. Erica  gives me detailed instructions on the custom exercise for me. Her training is including whole parts of my  body exercises so each exercise is very helpful for my body making. Program is perfectly fit for my body weight , height and age. She also teaches me how to prevent injuries during the weight training. She teaches  me how to stretch each body part. Program is really outstanding - lots of details to right postures, right weight selections, chair height, bar positions and so much more. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Mona! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Well be sure to let Erica know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great friendly staff. They do a good job always sanitizing the equipment and making sure everybody is safe and healthy. Shout out to the staff member! Oh and they have the best smoothie makers in Greater Vancouver in my opinion ;)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great! Happy to be your top Coquitlam gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym always clean and so much equipment never any waiting. Pick the right time of day no crowds and out in 90 minutes. Staff always friendly especially front desk staff...
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we appreciate your support!  Always a pleasure to see you :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The cleanest and most Covid friendly gym I have been too. Everyone wipes down there machines after use. everyone gets there own spray bottle that is sanitized before use. Golds is a 5 star gym!

She s Awesome!!! I trained almost a year with her. She has all the knowledge of the workout and is very polite and friendly. Thanks to her, my body has been strengthened with muscles in my whole life and has never been this healthy. She is perfect Personal trainer. I am very proud that she is my trainer.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Elisa! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Will always be my favourite gym! Spacious, good well maintained equipment! Only complaint is that it gets way to busy but that s like any gym
Golds is a fabulous gym and Ruba was so welcoming and kind - would highly recommend this location
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Ida. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Golds Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Cleanest gym I have been to.  Only 75 people MAX in a large space.  You get your own sanitized water bottle upon entry.  Someone there to check your temperature and monitor.  5 stars for sure
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us! Happy Lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: The facility is very clean. The staff do not turn over. Staff take the time to get to know you in a socially appropriate manor. You are always made to feel like you belong there. The facility communicates verbally, through signage, and with online emails, and webpages. COVID precautions were followed diligently. After a year of membership, interrupted by COVID, I decided to retain the assistance of a personal trainer with some mobility and fitness issues. Erica Lee was chosen based on my spouse s experience helping her with her fitness and mobility issues. We are 69 and 70 years old otherwise very fit for our age. Erica, through a painful supervised and assisted exercise routine has dramatically improved my mobility to do my ordinary activities of daily living. Having lots of strength and cardio exercise capacity does not work well if movement is painful or restricted. She has improved the quality of my life in ways I could not do for myself. Erica supervises  and assists my workout twice a week. My plan is continue this program with Erica indefinitely.. thank you Golds Gym

I ve always had a problem working out in gyms because often i d get uncomfortable in the all gender section. At golds this is not the case, the staff and members are all super respectful of everyone around them. Not once have i felt uncomfortable at this gym.

Golds has done an exceptional job of complying with the Provincial Health regulations. The gym is always spotless and they have implemented additional cleaning measures to keep it s members as safe as possible. My wife, daughter and I appreciate the effort that goes into maintaining this standard. Thank you Golds!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience so far, happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love the gym! Paolo & Ruba are awesome and make the experience that much better. Highly recommend this gym
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Carm! Appreciate you taking the time to share your experience! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Pretty solid gym. The place is kept pretty clean, the staff is all really nice. Core Culture being downstairs is very convenient for people in need of any supplements or even a post workout shake. It s like an all in one.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Jackson! Happy to hear that you are enjoying both the gym facility and Core Culture! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wonderful family owned business. They are very successful in giving the full experience to their Gym members and their staff. We have been at this location and the staff are so friendly which is a great sign of positive leadership and ownership. Best Gym in PoCo by far.
Awesome gym! Been coming here for 2 years now and it s been a great experience. Great equipment, the gym itself is massive and the staff are wicked. Would recommend to anyone and everyone
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Darren! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and well be sure to let the team know what you said! Glad to have you part of our Golds Gym Port Coquitlam community. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a very well run and organized gym.  The facilities are clean and spacious.  The manager Joel and his staff are friendly and accommodating.  I highly recommend this gym to anyone interested in personal fitness at a top notch gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Jim! Well be sure to let Joel and the team know what you said. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Paolo demonstrated outstanding service in our discussions. He is extremely knowledgeable about training programs and recommended the right plan for me. Highly recommend Paolo to anyone in need of a personal training program!

name: GoodLife Fitness Burnaby Northgate
address: GoodLife Fitness Burnaby Northgate, 3433 North Rd, Burnaby, BC V3J 0A9

detailed_reviews.review_text: Beautiful and massive gym space. They have a great membership program that gives you access to a tanning bed, steam and sauna room, yoga studio, locker and unlimited fresh towels. The location is great as its right next to Save On Foods and Shoppers Drug Mart. They have all the equipment you need to do various workouts and multiple sanitization stations to wipe surfaces and equipments. Highly recommend people in Burnaby to go there once while exploring gym options.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your review! We appreciate the positive feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very nice gym . Lots and lots of Workout station . Usually no to min wait for a workout machine.Not allowed in take pic . There is a ladies only section . Few clicks
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review James! We hope you have a great workout on your next visit to the club

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a very good gym! Large room with simulators.  Simulators are duplicated.  The simulators are made under the brand of a sports club GoodLife. The condition of the simulators is constantly monitored by the master and repaired if necessary. There are several departments.  Hall for group lessons.  Place for exercise on the mat.  Separate room for girls who are shy. Great changing room.  There are double size lockers for full height.  Many mirrors, hair dryers, lotion.  There is even an iron. In the mens locker room 9 showers, shampoo, shower gel, hair conditioner.  In the shower clean. Large towel issued at the entrance. There is a Finnish and Turkish sauna. Several bars with drinking water. Vertical turbo solarium, several massage chairs. I used a free ticket for 3 visits during the week.  This is a super offer! There is a large underground free parking. Great location. Successful sport club.

This is the best gym Ive ever been to! Staff is amazing and so friendly! A very welcoming environment, they really care about their members. Looks like a really taken care of facility, the hours are incredible. 110% would recommend if you are thinking of joining a gym, they even do complimentary 1 day trails, so if your gym shopping around definitely a place to stop by.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review, Nicole! Were happy to see how much youre enjoying your visits, and we hope to welcome you back soon for another great workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: The best gym ever with tan rooms, classes, so big area to train plus they very professional personal trainers, practicing now with Lioyd one of the best of them, planning to continue training with him

My son and I were just in town for a couple of days and I m supportive of my son s workout needs. We did not encounter any serious issues and for a fitness place that is open 24/7, I would have my son join if we lived here. My son said the equipment was in great condition, and privacy is there when necessary. Beyond that, for how big and busy this city can be, it is nice to know there are those who still find value in great customer service. Doing the right thing matters more at times than doing things right.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: This is great to hear! Were thrilled that your son has had a great experience at this location. We appreciate your feedback and for taking the time to write your Review! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I don t know why this gym doesn t have a higher rating. I love this gym & my experience every time that I drive all the way from Langley for my workouts. My first time in, a really friendly staff member gave me a tour and made me feel so at home. The gym is very clean, even the showers and towels. The staff always greet me upon entry and seem eager to answer any questions I may have. The atmosphere in the gym is really great due to the variety of people that attend. The women s section is quite small, but still has all equipment necessary to get a good workout in. The overall layout of the gym is really fantastic and there s plenty of space for a hiit setup, walking exercises or jump roping. Thank you for having created such a safe and welcoming environment. I definitely recommend this gym!!!

I always recommend this location to all of my friends! The place is huge, theres a lot of equipment to use, the atmosphere is great!  And to top it off, the staff here are so friendly and supportive when it comes to your fitness goals! Have been going to this location since 2018 and I dont regret it at all. Special shoutout to the Assistant GM Ruba and Fitness Motivator Bella for always being kind, supportive, and for working so hard!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your Review, Michael! Were so happy to hear about your experience at this location and enjoy the atmosphere! We also appreciate the kind words about our staff!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love everything about this location. I had my first appointment/introduction with Hamzeh, he was super nice and helpful. I usually take budypump classes which I love, but the way I see there is no wait time for work out machines even in the afternoon that is supposed to be busy time. Definitely recommend this club
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and recommendation!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gained my 5 star rating yet again after they started almost all the services and 24 hours atleast 4 days in a week. One of the best spacious gyms they have across Canada. Definitely recommend who is looking for a great gym and want to make their happy place.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anurag, thank you for sharing this feedback. Many of the restrictions in place are a result of the pandemic and are temporary measures. We encourage speaking with the club manager to discuss these concerns further.

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of the best GoodLifes Ive visited.  The gym is always clean and the staff are super helpful and welcoming.  The equipment is kept in great condition.    It has never been too busy while Ive been there which is a bonus.   Definitely love coming to this location
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for such an amazing 5 star review Peter! Were happy to hear how much youre enjoying the club and we cant wait to welcome you back to the club for another great workout! See you soon

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had the best personal training sessions with Paolo. He was excellent during each session that we had together, however i am sad to find out that he is leaving the gym since it wont be the same without him there!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share this amazing review and 5 star rating!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been training with Paolo at Goodlife and I will continue doing it. I love the way he combines different exercises, gets my heart pumping fast and achieve my results. I am working on body toning, muscle building and strengthening and his training is really helping me to reach achieve my goals. Training with a personal trainer can be really mandatory when you want to achieve your results faster and in an efficient way. But most important is to find the right trainer! After trying 2-3 different trainers in the city, I decided I to work with Paolo as he does care about me and my goals. If looking for the best training at good life I recommend working with Paolo!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for this amazing rating and review! We look forward to continuing to celebrate your future milestone and goals achieved.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ruba is truly incredible. She knows her members, she knows her team, and she knows what she s doing. The work she puts in to create a positive gym atmosphere and equip her team is obvious. I don t know how we got so lucky to have her.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share this amazing review and 5 star rating!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Nice place,friendly and awesome staff,equipments are quite diverse also it can be quite busy at peak hours but still not bad Please schedule more RPM and body pump
Training with Paolo has been fantastic. Large gym, always room on machines. Friendly staff with separate personal training area. Overall great experience so far.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating Alex!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been to many gyms in the Burnaby area and good life is by far my favourite. They have all the equipment needed and amazing staff. To be honest, I used to bash the women s section before realizing it is the best one within miles of this area. Way better than the women s section in the Metrotown GoodLife. I don t use the women s section tho  lol
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful rating Cynthia!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Solid gym, everything you could possibly need for weight training. Staff is always friendly and theyre typically fast at fixing any broken equipment. Can get busy at peak hours but Its predictable so you can avoid it depending on your schedule. Coming from club 16 I would say that this gym is worth the extra few bucks a month. Plus you cant beat the 24/7 availability.

MY 2ND HOME!!!! Cant beat any gym clubs I have tried out there. Besides on how I always complete my workout routine with this club, and have all the machines that I need. Its a 24 hours club by that means I can go at any time I want without any hassle. Me and my husband love love their childminding. Always attentive with our kids and the other kids. They have a huge womens only section and a clean womens changing and shower room. I like how they maintain cleancliness there too. I love how I can bring any friend or my husband for free with me at any time with the monthly plan I purchased. I always leave with a contentment working out here and I dont think Ill ever transfer to any other clubs. The only thing tho, I hope you can also have childminding @noon on Fridays. It would be so much convenient for us parents to workout! However, I hope you can keep the great job Goodlife fitness Northgate!!!!

Attended this gym for quite some time. Love the staff, the equipment is top of the class. There are always plenty of machines and weights to use. Squat rack being used? ah well. There are five more to choose from. Not to mention the size of this place! It s huge Love this gym

Amazing gym with amazing staff. As soon as I walked in, I felt like part of the gym community. Ive been training with one of the trainers and it has been one of the best investments Ive ever made. The Fitness Manager and my trainer have single handedly made my first ever gym experience less intimidating and something I look forward to being a part of. Thank you GoodLife for employing great people!

Awesome location to train at! I have been training with Gordon and hes been amazing. He is very personable and knows just how to motivate me during my bad days. I recommend him to everyone, especially if you are trying to make a change to your fitness and health!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stanley! Were so happy to hear about your experience training at the gym with Gordon. Thank you for sharing your kind words!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym. Staff are all friendly (not sure why others are complaining). This location is spacious, has plenty of cardio machines (all with live TV), and the change rooms are clean and big.  They brought the Toronto GoodLife experience to BC. I would recommend this gym if you dont want to over pay, and still get a great gym... oh ya its 24 hours too, 7 days a week - huge bonus!

I have been training with Paolo for 8-1/2 months. He is a thorough and engaging trainer. He is constantly changing and adjusting our routines to push me to reach my always progressing goals. I would highly recommend Paolo for all levels of personal training!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review Christopher! Were happy to hear all the great work you and Paolo have done for your fitness journey! We hope to welcome you back to the club soon for another great workout with Paolo

detailed_reviews.review_text: Big, bright gym with lots of equipment - solid offering of free weights. Knowledgeable staff and trainers. 24/7 operations which is nice if you want to go super early or late. Been a member for 1 1/2 years and will definitely keep coming back.

I love this gym. Its a great size and the womens only section is big too. I go before work and for once DO NOT have to bring shampoo, a towel, hair dryer, moisturizer or a straightener because its all there for your use. Definitely lightens the gym bag load! Ive had good experiences with most of the staff there, only one time I had someone super dismissive. Mimi or Momo, I think Momo. I had concerns about maintenance that had gone undone for weeks and she super super rude about it. Its the only time Ive considered finding a new gym.

I love that they have a womans only section. The bathrooms/change room is nice and spacious. They have a super easy to use app for booking a time slot to workout. The covid procedure seems to be working great.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star review Mia! Were happy to hear how much youre enjoying the club and our app

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive been training with Paolo for almost a year, working with him to reach my fitness goals has been excellent. The environment has been awesome and pushes me to strive to work even harder. Paolo has built a strong connection with me and I look forward to our weekly training sessions.
Great gym with lots of machines, free weights, massage chairs, steam room and sauna. Open 24/7.

Absolutely amazing gym...by far worth the money each month. The trainers are superb and will work with you to develop in ways that work towards your sport or goals. I have had the same trainer for 3 years plus and he has seen me through thick and thin. No matter what, the workouts were always geared towards what I could do....they were challenging...and I always come away having laughed, worked hard and with a feeling of success. Some days, as I fought Lyme disease, the workouts were super easy...no worries. It was what I could do that day. I do a number of sports like indoor rowing, triathlon, spin cycling, running, indoor rock climbing and open water swimming. The workouts help me in ALL disciplines. And for me, the trainers and the staff at this Goodlife feel like family. Its my go to place....feel 100% supported here.

I have been a member of this gym for years and I mainly attend the group classes.  I really enjoy taking Carrie s, Angela s, May s and Kendall s classes. I can t say enough about how they all have different teaching styles and not everyone likes it but I do. It keeps me on my toes and I have fun working out with them. Btw I really like Carrie s straight forward attitude!!!

This gym is great.  The staff are nice and welcoming. Good equipment and fantastic lighting with lots of mirrors to check out my gains. Also, to catch ppl mirin my aesthetics is a great confidence booster. AND THERES LIKE 5 SQUAT RACKS.. LEG DAY EVERYDAY #bless

I have been coming to this location for a few years now. I just do my work outs and leave. What really tore at my heart strings was when the front desk girl Francine, instantly went to hug a member when she found out her mother passed away. You dont see great customer service like this anymore. I love how compassionate and caring she is, I have never interacted with her but this morning I said hi. Though all the stress of not being able to see, she still puts others first.

Never had a problem here. You can bring someone with you for free EVERY time you work out, it s awesome.($50/month) to access any location in BC. Seem to have a good selection of classes, it s too bad the sovereign location doesn t have more morning classes, but this location picks up their slack!

Pre-COVID it used to be 24 hour gym and reduced hours on holidays, now it s not 24 hours and closed holidays. Still 5 stars because it s a great gym but hoping the hours go back to before so I don t have to pay $20 drop in at a gym that is open on holidays when I have a full time membership here
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great 5 star review Steve! Were definitely hoping to start expanding hours now that were open across the country again and we can start resuming normal operations. Please feel free to share any other future feedback with us and enjoy your next workout

detailed_reviews.review_text: This gym is held together by a friendly girl, who smiles, waves and acknowledges every member and guest. Francine deserves more recognition, she is seen doing her job correctly. She greets us, she gives us hugs if we re down. She s a little mama in the making.

I love this place! I was a GL member in Ontario and, when I moved to BC, I had to cancel my membership becasue there were not any locations here. It was an easy process and I spent the next few months trying different locations in the area to try and find a place that I liked as much. I finaly settled at one place and hated it so much that I barely went. I was SO happy to see a GL location here! I waited until I was able to cancel my membership with my other gym and I made an appointment with Louise to go over my options here. She was absolutely fantastic! Ive now been here for a few months and there is so much that I just love about this place. Here are a few highlights: 1. Great location. Think about it. Youre on your way home from work and you can hit the gym, grab that jug of milk that you needed from Price Smart and that prescription from Shoppers and not have to run all over the place doing it. 2. Gorgeous facility. GL has a ton of space with loads of new equipment. Every piece of cardio equipment has a little TV screen and an iPod/iPhone charger built into it. This means that the hour you spend sweating isnt boring and you also reduce the risk of dropping your iPhone because its attached to something. 3. Classes. The classes here are fantastic! There are a lot of free ones including Body Pump, Body Flow and Zumba. There is a seperate studio for spinning classes and those are free too. Yoga classes are in a much quieter area and are not included but are really not expensive. 4. Staff. I know that a lot of reviews here said that the staff are not good but Ive never had an issue with them and have always found them to be really nice. There are sales staff, customer service staff and trainers and they are all really professional and friendly. (As for the claim that they lied about cancelation fees - read the contract before you sign it because everything is in there. And if you keep your copies of the paperwork then its super easy to cancel things if you need to.) 5. The locker rooms. This might not seem like a big deal but when you have spent the last few years at a gym with rusty lockers, communal showers and not a single ammenity then this is a huge wow. The locker rooms are massive and nothing has been overlooked here. They provide irons and ironing boards, hair dryers, straighteners, curling irons, shampoo, conditioner, body wash etc right down to Q-Tips. There is a really nice sauna and there are two gorgeous little steam rooms in here too. I was really happy to see that there are about ten private shower stalls (and they are HUGE) because this means that I will never again have an old womans naked bum rub against me (that did happen and I was traumatized. True story!). 6. The training. I have not signed up for training here yet but I did go for the free consultation and Mike was great. He set up a workout schedule for me based on what I like to do and what I want to accomplish and he also gave me a lot of nutritional information. Ive already lost about ten pounds! 7. Motivation. GL offers optional workout cards that you can fill out when you complete workouts. They have a lot of incentives for people to get the results they want and everyone there is more than happy to do what they can to help members reach their goals (results = more customers). Definitely check this place out for yourself!

Very nice fitness, spacious, clean and bright! Good access and plenty of devices. The only problem is distance for me! Why don t you have a branch in Coquitlam! It s quite a populated city which needs one!
Alexey was really nice and helpful. Very knowledgeable and helped me to achieve my goals. If you need a personal trainer goodlife will be a really good option.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Signed up today. Had a guy named Justin help me out with the process. He was very kind and professional. Highly recommend and appreciate this location. The gym it self has everything anyone could need.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you John for the 5 star review and were so excited to welcome you to Goodlife Fitness! We wish you all the best on your fitness goals at the club and feel free to contact us if you ever have any questions

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym, clean and sanitary. They have a good selection of equipment and the staff are always friendly and smiling. Great place to pump some iron.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review Stu! Were glad to hear how great your club experience has been and the great work by the team to make it even better!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Dear Sarah, Its unfortunate that you failed to write the truth about your experience at Goodlife and with me. You neglected to mention that recording your workouts meant that you were actually filming them on your camera phone which goes completely against our member rules and etiquette, and you are also in breach of your membership. After politely asking you to stop filming the first time, you completely ignored my request. You continued to film and slam weights on several occasions (even after you asked my husband to step out of the way of your camera!) and I know for a fact that several other members and employees also had issues with you because they brought it to my attention. Sarah, our RPM group fitness instructor asked you politely to stop dropping the barbell (from waist high) as it was interrupting her class beside you when all the members continued to turn and look at you repeatedly. This was extremely loud and you were well aware of how it was disturbing other members. You just shrugged this off and didnt seem to care about how this was affecting others around you. Leila, our administrator also had a chat with you where she tried to explain the proper rules (all gyms are the same) but you didnt seem interested in hearing about it. You also said that when you signed up, the Fitness Advisor told you it was okay to film but when Leila asked who that advisor was, you couldnt give a name even though it is written on your contract. Simon, our manager is well aware of the situation and I can tell you this....after six years with Goodlife, never ONCE have I had a complaint against me. I know our rules and etiquette of the gym and slamming weights and filming are not part of them or any other gym. Since you claim to be a powerlifter perhaps its a blessing that you found another gym which specializes in powerlifting as Goodlife certainly doesnt fit your criteria. Good luck in your new gym. *Rachel....thank you for a refreshing review! We are working on connecting to wifi and should hopefully have it by the time you come back.

Decided to check out this location the other day. I typically go to the location near Metrotown. This location was not as crowded compared to the other location. And they had more machines to use (more than 1 bicep macine). Overall a nice gym but to out of the way for me. I would still recommending checking out the location at least once.

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a great gym. The staff is very friendly and approachable if you have any questions and feedback on equipment etc. I would give this gym 4.5 stars only because they are missing a few key pieces of equipment but that s only if your the body builder kinda guy. But I did talk to them and they are planning on adding those pieces in the next couple years which is why I gave the 5 stars. One is the pendulum squat machine which is one of the best machines to add on your leg day to really focus on the quads better than any workout you can think of for the quads. The pendulum squat machine is very difficult to find in any gym so the fact that they re adding it is amazing. Another is a standing lateral raise machine, Some call it a Watson machine. Another is the standing T Bar Row, they do have the seated one, but it doesn t put you at the best angle but still workable. All in all a great gym if you can avoid the busy hours. Thank you Golds!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Daniel. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym West Broadway. detailed_reviews.review_text: Best Club downtown. Awesome Technogym equipment. CLEAN! Their Covid-19 cleaning standards are above and beyond. Putting forward their best interests in safety for their valued members. Friendly and welcoming staff. Sense of belonging to the club. Finally a downtown gym with some etiquette. Members put their weights away. Respectful environment. Equipment well laid out for spacing/social distancing. 1hr 45min free parking. Added crossfit sections. Lots of cardio machines! Huge big screens to catch up on your fave Sports between sets. A gym environment where you truly feel the value of health and fitness!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Compared to other gyms, I find the staff at this gym quite cooperative and helpful. The gym is quite clean and the equipments are in good condition.

First thing I noticed during my time at Golds gym is the large variety of equipment available to the public, as well as the amount of weights available for use (Not the free weight though). The layout of the gym floor is efficiently setup so that no corners are left unused. Couldn t have been more impressed with the service and my time here without help from Jessica as well. If they keep up the sales here I ll definitely get my friends to come along soon!

So I will start with the negative stuff: -most of the times free weights area can get crowded ( the good news is its not the whole day) I do think the gym management can re arrange the the gym in a better way to separate the free weights area from the machines area, the gym has plenty of empty space this will results in a less dense area) - The weights are annoying to put on and off easily into the bar (on the good side it wont be lose when you are bench pressing :)) -The changing room/locker area doesnt smell nice it doesnt smell bad either just no fresh air I guess ( install better ventilation plz) Now to the good stuff : -Nice friendly management and staff -The gym is always cleaned by someone all the time -New equipments and machines the best I think at least for all the gym I have been to all my life- 7 gyms total - -running machines treadmills has no TV! -location is great bus stop in front of the gym and there is parking underground as well I will update this review every few months
Nice gym , nice staff , would be good if there would be some shower gels or shampoo in changing room the rest is great
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, Kateryna.- Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Absolutely excellent staff, facilities and personal trainers. Very good at adapting for those with medical issues and injuries. Experienced with hyper mobility.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Sally. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: For the classes, spinning, hot yoga and 24 hour access, this gym is definitely worth the membership. Parking is also free for 90mins and is a great perk especially for the busy location where parking elsewhere is costly/limited. Its a brand new facility with brand new equipment. Theres a small womens only section equipped with frew weights, cable machine, smith machine, leg adduction/abduction machines, lat pull down and some cardio machines.

The staff is always friendly and cheerful, even @5am which is a great start to the day. The facility is always clean, machines are rarely down for any period of time and there s ample room between stations to navigate without fear of tripping over someone. The facility has a good mix of free weights and machines so there s always options if the bench or machine you wanted to use is occupied. If you live within a 30min drive, this gym is well worth the commute. Also, a 1-time parking pass fee for free parking on the west side in a secured facility is a bonus!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Greg! We are grateful to have you part of our community and appreciate how much of a loyal member you have been! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: A gym with probably the best customer service, best aircon, and best quality machines. Im very pleased that the members here always have excellent etiquette, plates and dumbbells are always put back where they belong. There is free underground customer parking also

She knows how to motivate clients and keep that motivation going even during the harder weeks. Also, she keeps you accountable without overwhelming you. Not only did she help me improve my physical health, but also my mentality when it came to fitness. Raven is also very knowledgeable about nutrition which was an added bonus. She is truly a fantastic trainer and basically a lifestyle coach all in one! 10/10 would recommend her for someone who is just starting out a fitness journey like I was, or even for those who are more experienced.

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive review Lauren! We are so happy you have chosen to be part of our community! Keep crushing those fitness goals! Happy lifting! :)

Having a punching bag in the gym is a big plus and this reason why I chose to enrol with this gym! 5/5 Overall, best gym out there in Vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great review! We are so happy to have you part of our community and we will be sure to let Kyle know! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great place to work out. Super nice and helpful staff. I have been training with Grace for almost 2 months and it has been quite an experience. Grace is an amazing personal trainer and really easy to get along with.  She has thoughtfully created the training program as per my goals and pushes me to achieve it.
