detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shohra! We appreciate the great feedback and will be sure to also relay the message back to Grace! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Staff is amazing - super helpful and friendly! The gym is always very clean and well taken care of! Great vibe and layout. Throughout the pandemic I have felt very safe going to Golds West Broadway. The staff is very diligent with their protocols and following guidelines.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Taylor! Happy to hear you have been enjoying your experience here, happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: If youre looking for an amazing Trainer - request for Mirthy Cheung! If it wasnt for his attention to detail and constant motivation during and outside of training sessions -Id probably still have my Covid 15 weight  and be at a different gym. The place is pricey and I had offers for cheaper memberships with other gyms, but the personal training from Mirthy have brought my fitness level to a new level through proper technique, form and alternative workouts to maximize. Ive avoided sharing his talents in fear of him being overbooked, but he has made a tremendous difference in my personal fitness progress over the past 3 months, that others should also benefit from. The overall gym is clean and pretty pricey - but staff are awesome especially the front desk.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Marc! Thank you for the great review! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! We are grateful for having you part of our Golds Gym community :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had an amazing experience here. Staff were accommodating and very friendly. Equipment is all well maintained. Highly recommended checking them out!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Bailey. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Golds Gym West Broadway Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: So happy I joined this gym. So clean and staff actually walk around and care about their facility. Staff and management address us by our names. Everyone gets their own sanitizer bottle. There is an actual cleaner . Cleaning supplies are always available. When supplies have run out, it is replaced within minutes. I feel so comfortable being inside this place and I am so grateful I have a clean gym to work out of leading up to my competition! Props to Noz and the West Broadway Team!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eva! Thank you so much for the 5 stars and the great feedback! We will be sure to relay the nice message back to the West Broadway Team! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of the best gyms on the West Coast and Vancouver! Close to my condo downtown! I can go anywhere in the World and use the travel pass and most of the fitness models who come to the city for periods of time will come use this facility. Almost 2 hours free parking provided. Free passes for my friends and family and colleagues to try out. Staff is super nice and easy to get along with! They know all the good spots in town, social and fitness. Prices are fairly reasonable. Policy/protocol with Covid is consistent and overall, a clean gym. I cannot find dust anywhere. Mirrors are sparkling clean for those gym selfies! One of the cleanest green turf areas I have ever seen in a gym. Way to uphold the brand Golds Gym! Never been a member of any other gym. Started off at the Mecca in L.A and now Golds Gym British Columbia!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Amazing! Thank you so much for this review! We are grateful you chose our community to be a part of and that you tell all your friends and family about us! Next time youre in, please ask for the General Manager, Noz. She will be more than happy to give you some swag for all the referrals. Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Thank you to the staff at Vancouvers Golds Gym on West Broadway. As a 65 year old lifter, I have gone to Golds 4-5 times a week this year. I have felt safe every time I worked out. Staff has always been cordial when screening us members at the door, an extremely repetitive task. In addition, Golds trainers have always set an example of safety when training their clients. Impressed! As an older personal trainer myself, I appreciate the extensive equipment at Golds. And I appreciate good maintenance and hygienic practices by both staff and members. Golds has kept me safe and sane during this pandemic. Well done!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Hugh! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! You are one of our favourite, loyal and most consistent members! We are so grateful to have you part of our Golds Gym Family! See you soon! Happy Lifting!! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Appreciative of the staff Noz and Nicole. With the transition back into the gym after Covid I was hesitant to return but they made me feel very comfortable and safe. Theyre always very respectable and aware of boundaries. Those two have really stuck out and I cannot thank them enough for making me feel as safe as I do in this gym. Some friends have made the switch as well when I told them how amazing they have been with the restrictions. The equipment is always monitored and clean and I love seeing the staff go the extra mile to help us all stay safe. Thank you both!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We will be sure to let Noz and Nicole that they are greatly appreciated! We are grateful to have you part our community! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great front desk staff, always friendly and helpful.  Gym is spotless and even though it gets quite busy sometimes everything is being cleaned constantly.  Very happy with my membership which I paid for upfront so no monthly fees.

I have been a member of this gym for the past three months and I am very happy with my experience. All the staff very nice and helpful. I have also been training with a coach her name is Grace. She is the best. I never thought that one day I will be able to attain this level and improve my fitness level this much. Thanks to Grace
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review and such a nice message for Grace! We will be sure to let Grace know! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Wow!! I couldn t be happier being a Gold s Gym Member. The facility is huge, sparkly clean, and has the most welcoming and professional staff to help you with all your needs. Huge shoutout to the amazing Gold s staff Noz and Nicole for always helping and motivating me throughout my whole experience at the gym. It makes coming to the gym so comforting and fun knowing you re surrounded by professional and incredible people. The booking system is so easy and awesome. I have always been able to get the time slot that I want and am able to cancel up to 10 mins before the session. Very convenient! I would definitely recommend Gold s Gym to all walks of life and would say it s the number one Gym in Vancouver and globally :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the positive feedback Kaitlyn! We are thrilled to have you part of our community! We will be sure to let the ladies know they are appreciated! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been visiting Golds Gym since this March. The every member whether trainers or trainee follow the COVID-19 protocols. I have been working with this Amazing Trainer Grace Wang, she is focused and determined in bringing best out on the clients. She is well experienced and also creative when it comes to workout. I personally everyday look forward to do workout with her. Worth joining and taking Personal training at this Gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Karanpreet! Thank you so much for the 5 star review! We will be sure to let Grace know that she is very appreciated! We are excited to watch you crush your fitness goals here at Golds Gym West Broadway! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this gym! It was so hard finding a spacious gym in Vancouver with up to date equipment while still being affordable, but Golds Gym on West Broadway checks all of the boxes! The owner and team that works there are so nice and accommodating as well. Definitely check this gym out!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback Fatemeh! We are grateful to have you part of our community! Continue to crush those fitness goals! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Overall, a great gym. The gym staff is always polite, professional, and they do a great job making sure the facilities are clean and tidy. As well, the General Manager, Noz, always takes time out of her day to stop and say  hi  to gym members during their sessions. Really makes it feel like you re part of a community.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for the positive review Alexi! We will be sure to let Noz know she is appreciated. We also appreciate that you have remained a loyal member to us during the hard times! Looking forward to many more good times and to watch you on your fitness journey! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: So... As a long term member of another gym, I have to say that it was very weird making golds into my new home but its kind of warming up to me. the staff at golds are super nice. Although inconvenient with the whole time slot thing I like that golds has frequent times that they go around to clean and disinfect all the gear. I really like that the gym is very inviting for people that want to practice Olympic weight lifting as the platform, bars and plates are all eleiko branded. I hope one day the gym will once again be 24/7 with the showers! but we all take it one step at a time. overall its a really nice experience training at golds and I recommend it :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback Kristian! We will be making some changes in the next couple months ... Stay tuned! We are grateful for your passion on the Olympic lifting platforms! See you soon! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: If I could give 6 stars I would! I am so impressed with this gym. It is an organized, incredibly clean and safe place with top notch covid protocols. The extremely friendly, hard working and accommodating staff make you feel welcome and the equipment is always in great condition. Especially during such uncertain times, it s so nice to be able to go to a place where you feel like family Way to go!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback. We are so happy to have you part of our family! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Jessica at Golds Gym has just been amazing! The follow-up to me was key since Ive always had a busy schedule. She gave clear precise instructions on my first day and never made me feel pressured to join the gym. I always hated that from other gyms. Thank you so much for your help! Oh and she also got a friend of mine the same good October deal! What a steal!

Great! Im a new member and I am loving Golds Gym! Due to covid, I havent had a gym membership in 2 years, but I miss Gym Life so I decided to get back into yearly Gym membership. I browsed several other gyms before checking out Golds Gym. From my friends referral I got to check out Golds Gym free for a day.  Honestly, Golds Gym was the best out of all the other gyms I checked out. I really like how West Broadway Golds Gym has new well-maintained clean equipment and the gym itself is clean. The gym has enough space that I can find a quiet space for myself to stretch before working out. The West Broadway staff are friendly, welcoming, and always helpful. The General Manager Noz is super sweet and nice, and she really cares about all the members. Noz is the best! I recommend you check out Golds Gym, It is definitely the best in Vancouver!!!! I hope they open a Burnaby location in the near future!!

Been going to this gym for nearly 2 years now, not only are staff members friendly but the community as a whole is great too! Clean environment and friendly people from all walks of life. From fighters to bodybuilders, and powerlifters to Olympic lifters, it s nice to see the diversity in the fitness world at this gym. Trainer Mirthy is cool too. Non-intimidating, all inclusive gym c:
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback. We are so grateful to have you part of our community Kevin! We will make sure to let Mirthy know how much you appreciate him! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff here are super knowledgeable and genuine. I ve really enjoyed the large facility and online booking system. I ve gotten in every time I ve ever scheduled; you just have to look for last minute drop outs the day of. The capacity is 60 in the gym at a time. Big clean space. They sanitize the facility between each cycle of members. They also provide you with a spray bottle/sanitary wipes. They are keeping everything very controlled and clean while going thru this pandemic. I m super impressed with the level of care from the staff, and legitimate interest in getting to know us as individuals when we joined. Special shout-out to Nicole for always greeting us with a warm and friendly smile, asking us about our day/workout, and making sure everything is taken care of. Same with Noz. One of the best gyms I ve been to over the years.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback Chantel! We will be sure to let the ladies know that they are appreciated. We are grateful you are part of our community. We are excited to watch you achieve your goals with us! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is the best gym I ve ever been to, and I ve been to a lot of gyms. Everyone is so friendly and helpful. The machines and weights are top notch. They keep the place clean and they make it really easy to book a workout. The girl at the front desk, I think her name is Cy, is the best :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you James! We really appreciate the feedback and we will be sure to let Cy know! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing place! Safest place ! The most friendly and professional staff who are always happy and helpful. Thank you for keeping us safe and letting us work hard day by day . Keep up the hard work ! When you need help ? Just ask for Raven . She is one of the best in the industry .  It is very nice to see her coaching all the clients who needs advice. Workout plan , diet , lifestyle . She is monitoring and supervising all her clients to the smallest details . Her clients are improving at Gold s in any level . Self confidence and strength guaranteed. Very nice to see the care what she shows day by day every time . Raven Rocks! Karoly Barna
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Karoly! You are one of our favourites! Thank you for remaining such a loyal member! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Best of the best. All the staff are so kind, courteous & helpful, always such a warm-welcoming vibe! They do an amazing job to maintain infection control policies, cleanliness 10/10. The members are also very friendly & respectful. All around good energy. Definitely a great place to work towards your health & fitness goals!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Noralee! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience with us so far, well be sure to let the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting.

detailed_reviews.review_text: My trainer, Raven is a great teacher and motivator for me. When I first came into Gold s Gym I was nervous about using the equipment properly and that my form was incorrect. Raven guided me through my programs before I tried them solo in the gym and broke down my form so we could break bad habits and put new/correct ones in place. She has brought back my love for the gym and lifting heavy weights and I couldn t really imagine missing one of my gym days. She s a lot of fun, even when it s way too early in the morning. Super kind and really enjoyed our sessions together.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Claudia! Thank you for the nice feedback! We will be sure to let Raven know! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very well-equipped, well-maintained gym. I worked with Amir Mojibian for three months and he helped me get a good routine going, and we knocked off a bunch of my goals. Hes a fantastic, adaptive coach.

This place is always clean and always a good vibe. Things have been extremely difficult post Covid but this place manages to consistently maintain its cleanliness and uphold its customer service. I see the negative reviews and its mostly about money as if people have some sort of entitled expectations of getting out of contracts just because its a gym. Can you get out of your mortgage as easily? Can you get out of your car lease as easily? And if you do, you pay a penalty. Get over it Vancouver. You want an honest and clean facility to exercise in, this is the place for you! Thank you Golds!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and support Beauty Body! We are so grateful to have you part of our family! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. They are eager to help motivate and inspire me to achieve my goals. Covid safety protocols were always in place and disinfectant supplied to all clients. I highly recommend this gym to anyone who wants results fast
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback Johnny! We are so happy to have you part of our community! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: My 5 stars review goes to the gym and to my PT Raven! I started my journey towards a healthier and more fit me one year ago and I couldn t be where I am without Raven s training. From the first day Raven understood my goals and my needs and helped me meeting them with passion and patience. She strives for progresses not for perfection. She thought me to be consistent, patient and kind to myself. She believes in me even when I don t and always pushes me to the next level and to give more. I have seen a huge improvement in my body, my weight, my approach to the gym and my techniques since I am training with her. She is definitely a lifestyle trainer and I wish everyone can find their Raven and let their transformation begin!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! So nice to hear! We will be sure to let Raven know! We are so grateful to have you part of our Golds Gym community! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been coming here on a regular basis.  Love the gym, and the clean environment. I was having a hard time with my key fob the other day and Savrina at the front desk helped me figure it all out through the golds gym app. Very grateful for being so helpful and kind, will be recommending this gym to all my friends and family
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 stars Adeebah! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love Golds! New to vancouver and always look forward to my daily gym sessions :) Nicole has always been super friendly, and made me feel welcome from the start. She always has such positive energy and is always there to help me out. All the girls at the front are always so sweet especially Diana/Dana? and Eve/Ava? (im awful with names) I started personal training with Gabe and have been enjoying it! Would 100% recommend him. He is super attentive and great at problem solving  when something isnt working. Always friendly and encouraging :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Olivia! Thank you so much for the feedback! We will be sure to let Nicole, Dara, Eve and Gabe all know how much theyve made you feel part of our community! We are excited to watch you crush your fitness goals! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is the best gym in the area! It could be bit a lot better though. It would be nice to have squat rack with wooden floor, and a bench press with adjustable height for people with short arms like me. The gym has high quality up to date equipment, professional staff, clean/well kept, and over all good vibes.

This gym is by far the nicest gym I have ever worked out at! Their Covid protocols are top notch. The staff are so friendly and create a caring atmosphere for their members! Chloe, Tamara, Nicole and Raf are the most wicked morning squad! You re definitely in for a laugh and a friendly greeting with this badass crew
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Lucy! We are so happy to hear and will be sure to let the morning team know what you said. Happy lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym, all the equipment is new, they have good subscription promotions and their own parking (which is weird in Vancouver and could save you tons of $$) the staff is amazing and welcoming, I had my complementary session with John today and he was incredible, he is very knowledgeable and caring, not only did he answer all the questions I had (which there were a lot) but he made sure I understood everything and actually showed me how to do the exercises properly, how to avoid getting injured and gave me tips to guide me towards my goals. We went well above the hour and he still took the time to show me some exercises I could do at home when I told him I had lower back pain. After 2+ years of doing weights thanks to John I realize that I was doing most of them wrong and that was probably the cause of my lower back pain. I would 100% recommend him, he is not only extremely knowledgeable and helpful but he is really passionate about fitness and helping people :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great review Nea! We will be sure to relay the message to John! So happy to hear he has corrected your form and therefore reducing your injury! Happy youre a member of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: From my experience of the gyms in Vancouver, Golds Gym is one of  the best to go, professional and good machines
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ali! Thank you for you positive feedback! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: This gym is by far one of the best in the area, in my opinion. COVID-19 has been challenging for businesses, especially in the fitness industry, to navigate. However, I feel that this location has done a great job. Staff are friendly, welcoming and accessible at all times for any of your needs. They are responsive both in person, and over the phone to answer any questions or concerns that may arise. The gym is spotless; it is evident that this location values the advice of the Ministry of Health and goes above and beyond the current COVID-19 guidelines. The gym has done its best to institute policies and practices that ensure that every member has the opportunity to have a safe, effective workout. The current guidelines not only hold their staff accountable, but also other members, making it one of the places that I feel the safest in our current state. I will definitely be recommending this gym to my friends and family. The facility itself is top notch, but it is really the staff that make this place excellent. If youre looking for a new gym, look no further than here!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, Megan! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us and feeling comfortable and safe while you workout. We re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had Grace as my personal trainer for a few sessions at this gym. She is a very nice and supportive trainer. She is very good at explaining the mechanics of body movements and helps you reach your goals. The gym itself also has good equipment
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Nicki! Thank you for the great 5 star review! We will be sure to let Grace know she is appreciated! Continue to crush those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym, great atmosphere, and fantastic staff. Jessica took care of my needs during my trial and tour at this location. I appreciate they take covid seriously and it seems that a majority of the members follow up with the rules and cleanliness of the place.

Not many people can get me out of bed before 7am but working out with Raven has been a great experience for the past few months. Raven is a fantastic personal trainer who always motivates me to train harder.  Her personalized workout plans are challenging but fun and has helped me improve my form, gain strength and achieve my fitness goals.  I highly recommend Raven if you are looking for a trainer - she is the best at Golds!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anita! We appreciate the great feedback and will be sure to also relay the message back to Raven! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I cant say enough great things about this gym, but I will try here. Basically I know you dont want to read an endless review with all the same things that were said so my main point is that this gym is incredible.  The classes are fantastic with excellent, quality instruction.  Everything in the gym is high tech, yet even a low tech woman like me can manage to enjoy it with some guidance.  The free weights and machines are fantastic.... cardio equipment is the best I have ever seen and the assisted stretch area is amazing.  Its a wonderful family run business that has been anything but a cash grab from my experience.  Hopefully see you there for a workout :)

I ve been training with vetri for 2 months and I already feel the difference. The gym is spacious and has a good vibe. Vetri has been wonderful and My main factor to get out of bed and go train. Appreciate the good costumer service I receive for any problems I have.
We LOVE Golds Gym! Our personal trainer, Jean, has gone way beyond any of our expectations to help us achieve goals and set new ones. The equipment, team and COVID safety measures are fantastic.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the 5 stars! We will be sure to let Jean know. Excited to see you guys crush your fitness goals at our facility! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been training with Raven for over a year now. The gym facilities are fantastic- Golds has everything you need to reach your goals including group classes when they re open. By far though, my PT Raven has had the biggest impact on my success. Not just for what she s taught me about form, new exercises tailored to my goals, and reaching fitness milestones along the way- but for the confidence I ve gained through the process. I ve had incredible physical results from the training, but more importantly was the change in my mindset. Raven taught me to set smaller achievable goals along the journey, find what drives me when I m motivated so I can lean into that when I m not, and that it s not perfection but progress and consistency that are key. Throughout my journey so far she s always been in my corner. More than that though, Raven also taught me to be there for myself.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great 5 star review! So touching to hear the success story and the relationship you have built with your trainer Raven! We will be sure to let her know she is much appreciated!! Continue crushing those goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good gym and equipment, and happy with covid protocols. Ive been training with Vetri for a month, and I already feel like Im physically stronger than before. Ive neglected physical fitness in the past and hes really helped encourage me to come to the gym more, build a habit of exercising often, and taught me how to train with the right posture.

Im 65 and havent exercised in a very long time  Joined Golds and got a personal trainer and I cant say enough good things about the gym and my trainer, Ryan. He is awesome! So good, in fact, that my son is training with him now.

Gold s West Broadway has done an outstanding job establishing and implementing adequate covid protocols which maintained a safe space for us to continue to workout. The staff is professional and friendly. The facility and equipment are clean and maintained to the highest standards. We love our Gold s Gym!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Sophia! Thank you so much for the positive feedback! We are so grateful that you and your family are part of our community! See you guys soon! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Professional gym with professional people! I train with the trainer Mirthy and he s been giving me new concept of what personal training should look like. Besides the great program he designed and his special techniques, he not only made me reaching to my goals, but also keeps me learning. Don t scared by his look, he s really sweet and caring! Highly recommend if you are looking for some serious muscle gain
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback. We will be sure to also relay the message back to Mirthy! Excited to watch you continue to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I make my way to this gym daily and have never had an issue. The folks who work there are warm, welcoming and keep the place clean for all gym go-ers. Theyve only recently allowed their members to enter without an appointed schedule which works better with my always fluctuating work hours. Enter when I want, exit when I want (although their busiest hours do have time restrictions. Thankfully that isnt a problem for me) But by far my most favourite thing is that it seems like they have an internal work joke, where the person at front has to go through a certain set of COVID 19 guideline questions (to ensure the safety of their customers) as quickly as possible. Auctioneer level speeds. Very impressive. But yeah, great variety of machines. Clean up after yourself. Maintain social distancing and youre happy as can be.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback Timothy! You have been a great member to us and we are so thrilled to have you part our community! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great facility - all the equipment you could every want in a gym for cardio and strength. Its a big place. Its clean - constant cleaning actually, and bright (large windows at street level along one wall which you would never know walking on Broadway). The classes they had pre-COVID were frequent and varied including yoga. The personal trainers are also great. I had the benefit of working with Mirthy who was professional, knowledgeable, communicated well and entirely supportive. He supported me in getting started and helped me work through some challenges in biomechanics.  Super highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Ryan! Thank you very much for the great feedback! We are so grateful you have chosen Gold s Gym West Broadway to crush your fitness goals! We will also be sure to relay the great message to Mirthy! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds is an elite fitness facility with motivated members, friendly and knowledgeable staff, and a perfect location right in the middle of Vancouver. I tried many gyms in Vancouver that were simply just satisfactory before Golds opened up and I couldn t be happier with the gym quality. If you are serious about fitness it is the only credible option in Vancouver.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jake! We are grateful for you! Happy Lifting! See you soon! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Gold s Gym staff may just be the best in the city. Their positive team spirit is infectious and their diplomacy in dealing with the mask rule breakers exemplary :) The facility is spotlessly clean and the atmosphere supports people who are serious about staying healthy! Thanks for giving me another family Gold s! I love you all! -Gabby xo
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback Gabby! :) We are so happy you joined us here and are part of our valued community! Continue to crush those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: In terms of equipment and atmosphere, this is the best gym Ive trained at in Vancouver. Their TechnoGym machines, the astroturf for dragging the sled and doing tire flips, the lifting platforms, and stretching machines offer more than you can find at most gyms. And its always impeccably clean in the open gym as well as the change rooms/washroom.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Matthew! Thank you for the great review and 5 stars! We appreciate your feedback and having you as a member of our community! Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Being open 24 hours is a huge plus for me. The facilities are new and they have sanitary wipes all over the place to keep it clean. Really happy with this gym. It has classes too but its more focused on working out as an individual than other gyms. Ive done some classes but mostly I like to put my headphones on and go and this is the right gym for that. Most people who work out here are pretty stylish, which I am sure can be a con for some people who like to get bitter about other people looking good, but to me its a motivation to get in better shape.

Amazing gym, they have a wide variety of equipment and everything is very clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Also, I booked a tour with Jessica and she was amazing, I recommend booking a tour with her, she explains everything in a way that it is easy to understand. Thank you Jessica!

By far the best gym I d ever gone to. The (pre-Covid) 24/7 hours worked well with my schedule, and the facility+staff attitude was always fantastic. On that note, their personal training program delivers  - I ve worked with Mirthy several times now and already he s helped me improve both my physique and my overall approach to personal fitness.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! Keep crushing those fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super clean facility, excellent equipment and helpful staff! We came from out of town and wish we could get our own membership here! Thanks for having us!

I was always doubtful about the whole personal trainer thing, especially when I already paid for membership to Gold s. I m no stranger to working out and I ve always been confident in my own ability to do it right, why would I need one? Mirthy has converted me. It s simple as that. I bought a package when i realized i wasn t really getting anywhere and if I was it was taking way too long. I chose him as my trainer because he is obviously invested in fitness (you have to see him to understand!). His knowledge, skill and drive have pushed me into working out the right way to get the results I want and need. He supports, re-focuses and guides. If you want results, he s your man. I ve never felt more alive.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Tim! Thank you for the great review! We will be sure to let Mirthy know! We are so proud to see you accomplish your fitness goals with us here at Golds Gym BC! Looking forward to more accomplishments in the future! And grateful for having you part of our Golds Gym community :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ali A. is an amazing personal trainer. My partner and I go to him twice a week, and its been a great way to keep on track and get stronger. He is dedicated to seeing us succeed, holds us accountable, and encourages us to be be our best. He is super easy to talk to and makes you feel like you can do anything if you put in the work. Very detail oriented, organized, and kind.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shawna, thank you so much for the 5 star review! We are so grateful your partner and yourself have joined our community! We will be sure to pass along the wonderful message to Ali! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The Golds Gym West Broadway location is a fantastic gym with new, clean, and well maintained equipment. The general manager Noz and the front desk staff members Margarita and Odin are super friendly and are just some of the amazing staff members who work there.

As a fitness competitor I have been to many gyms through out the US and Canada. I have seen great gyms, mediocre gyms and the not so great. Gold s Gym West Broadway is beautiful. On top, their staff and management are top notch! The mass return of members to the gym post covid, as one can imagine is no small feat. Management has been so quick to respond and resolve with any issues experienced in the new process. I have never in all my years experienced such amazing member care as I have with Gold s west broadway. (Kudos to Naz and Kyle who have really gone above and beyond with any requests I have had! I know its not easy, but you guys sure make it look simple!)

I have had personal training with both Mirthy Cheung and Vetrivelu Sekar. My experience with both has been phenomenal. They have really helped me achieve my fitness goals. They are both encouraging, and explain exercises in a clear way. Their workout programs are perfect: they find just the right balance between challenging and my comfort zone. I would recommend both Mirthy and Vetri to anyone looking to transform their fitness!

MIRTH was the best trainer Ive ever had. He was knowledgeable,  motivating ,and catered exactly to what your goals are not what they should be. He prepared training sets for me which he gave me. It wasnt just about business it was about building a relationship with him and golds.  He was always responsive to text messages when I had questions and he was very accomadating to your personal schedule. Apart from all that I saw results with him in a month that I could never get by myself. Thanks again man for the training and all the precise and intricate techniques you taught me.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the great feedback! We will be sure to let Mirthy know how much he is appreciated! We are grateful you chose Golds Gym West Broadway to crush your fitness goals! :) Happy Lifting! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: I just signed up recently and so far this gym has exceeded expectations on every level. Great customer service, super clean, beautiful new equipment, and parking too! I couldnt ask for more. Huge shout out to Ryan Snelling for helping me sign up, making me feel welcome, and going out of his way to ensure my experience has been top notch.

name: Gold's Gym Langley
address: Gold's Gym Langley, 19989 81a Ave, Langley Twp, BC V2Y 0C7

detailed_reviews.review_text: Facilities are clean and place is relatively well taken care of. Good culture and the place doesn t get as rushed as more budget gyms I ve been to in the past. I have done personal training with Vish - would recommend as you get to learn proper form, technique, have a workout plan. Plus with the personal training, there s a seperate room dedicated for it so you don t have to wait or worry about rush in the general gym faculties itself. The place has decent amount of parking as well including an underground. Overall would recommend this gym and it s personal training services.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Ayaan, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! Were thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your experience at Golds Gym Langley and that our facilities are clean and well-maintained. Its also great to know that youve had a positive personal training experience with Vish and that our separate room for personal training sessions has been convenient for you. We truly appreciate your recommendation of our gym and our personal training services. If you have any further feedback or suggestions, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. Thank you for choosing Golds Gym Langley, and we look forward to serving you in the future. Best regards, [Your Name] Golds Gym Langley

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a great experience at Gold s Gym Langley! I encountered a minor issue, but Dylan quickly resolved it with outstanding customer service. Thanks to him, my visit was smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend this gym!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with our gym. We understand your frustration and we apologize for the lack of communication and customer service you received. We take customer service very seriously and we are committed to providing a positive experience for all our members. Please be aware that our staff hours are until 6:00 pm on Sunday and hence no one could attend you on that day at 7pm. However will be more than happy to discuss and assist you in resolving this matter. Please give us a call at (604) 882-4653 to reach out directly to our management team. Thank you for your continued loyalty to Golds Gym, and we value you as a member of our community. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve our services and customer experience. We appreciate your understanding, and we look forward to the opportunity to resolve this matter and welcome you back to Golds Gym.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym with many equipments, has enough room for everyone to move around freely. Amenities like sauna or steam bath are always accessible.

The Sunday spin class is so fun and inspiring working out with an NCAA athlete. Twice the results from a rec centre atmosphere. The private infrared saunas in change rooms and wood faced lockers bring this gym above grade and membership is cheaper than Plus membership close by. Do yourself a favour and tour Langley - its not the old Golds! So cool!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jan, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review for Golds Gym Langley! We truly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear that you are enjoying our Sunday spin class and finding it inspiring to work out with an NCAA athlete. We take pride in providing a top-notch facility, including our private infrared saunas and wood-faced lockers, to create a comfortable and enjoyable atmosphere for our members. Its great to know that these amenities have added value to your experience. We truly value your support and cant wait to see you again soon! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley team

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym was really nice, and it s not too busy to the point you have to wait for a long time. Also Justin is very friendly, he was very helpful showing me around. Vish, who did my fitness orientation was very nice and knowledgeable with proper form and exercises.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear Edward Mykell, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience at Golds Gym Langley. Our team works hard to provide a clean and welcoming environment for all our members. We are thrilled that Justin and Vish were able to assist you and make your gym orientation a helpful and informative one. We pride ourselves on having knowledgeable and friendly staff who are always ready to assist our valued members like yourself. If you ever have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. We look forward to seeing you at the gym again soon! Best Regards, Golds Gym Langley Team

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a wonderful experience at Golds Gym in Langley, BC. The staff is friendly and helpful. They answered any questions I had about the gym. The facility is top notch with clean and modern equipment. Overall, it was an all-around great experience and I would highly recommend Golds Gym in Langley, BC!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Francis. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I had a good experience signing up for this gym. Dylan helped with my membership concerns and gave me best deal after speaking to me in detail. It s important to get to know your customer and provide a better deal and Dylan knows how to do that.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Bushra, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! Were thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience signing up at Golds Gym Langley. Were glad that Dylan was able to address your membership concerns and provide you with the best deal possible. Our team always strives to get to know our customers and ensure their satisfaction. If you have any further feedback or need assistance in the future, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653. We truly appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you at the gym! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley Management

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently visited Golds Gym Langley and was thoroughly impressed with the facility. The gym is incredibly clean and well-maintained, with up-to-date equipment that made my workout comfortable and safe. The staff were very knowledgeable and friendly, and I appreciated the welcoming atmosphere they created. They were also able to answer all my questions and help me with my fitness goals.

Gold gym langley has the best trainers! Especially i learned from Albert and i could acheive my personal goal within 6 months! He taught me a lot of things and also gave me a really good program. Going to the gym was not something that i enjoyed before but now im really happy to workout and follow the program that Albert gave me. I see the progress and also the challenges. Albert also helped me to find and fix the mobility issues of my body that might cuase potential injury as i workout more and harder.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Jung Sanghoon, Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a positive review about Golds Gym Langley! Were thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with our trainers, especially with Albert. Its wonderful to know that he helped you achieve your personal goals within just 6 months and provided you with a tailored program. Were glad to hear that you now enjoy going to the gym and that you see progress and challenges in your workouts. Its fantastic to know that Albert was able to address any mobility issues and prevent potential injuries as you push yourself harder. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to continue exceeding your expectations in the future. If you need any further assistance, please feel free to reach us at (604) 882-4653. Keep up the great work and enjoy your fitness journey! Best regards, Golds Gym Langley

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym great vibes. All the things you would want. Just wish they were open at 6am on the weekends instead of 7am. But over all I can t complain :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Ben, thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! Were glad to hear that youre enjoying the gym and the overall atmosphere. We appreciate your suggestion about opening earlier on the weekends and will take it into consideration for future improvements. Thank you for choosing Golds Gym Langley. If you have any further questions or concerns, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been a member here for a couple years now, absolutely love the staff and the gym itself is amazing. The facilities are great and I get lots of use out of their pool/hot tub. Definitely recommend checking it out!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you have had a great experience at our gym and appreciate your kind words about our staff. We hope to continue to provide you with the best possible service and support on your fitness journey. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to seeing you at Golds Gym Langley soon! Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: A very well managed, well equipped and well maintained facility. Instructors and coaches are excellent.  Sidak (manager) is awesome.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your positive feedback, Ayush! Were thrilled to hear that you found our facility well managed, equipped, and maintained. Our instructors and coaches work hard to provide excellent service. I appreciate your kind words about myself. If you have any further feedback or questions, please dont hesitate to reach out to us at (604) 882-4653.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gold s gym Langley is hands down the best gym choice in the Surrey/Langley area. It doesn t matter whether you are looking for a convenient location, expansive training space over floors, ample parking-Gold s meets all of these criteria and more. What I especially find endearing are the super friendly staff who are personable and help create a warm and trusting atmosphere. In fact, Gold s Gym Langley has had a handful of amazing   friendly, personable staff-superstars in my opinion like Cam, David, Dylan, Sophia, Jasmine and Jana!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, happy Lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: One of the best gyms in the lower mainland! I always feel welcomed the machines are super high quality for your workouts, Staff is always amazing and super helpful. Definitely recommend coming here!

Great facility and even better staff. Came in with a back injury trying to find certain machines my physio recommended. No other gym had it, some didn t even bother checking. Ashton from Langley location went above and beyond and not only helped me find the machines I was looking for, but was kind enough to show me other machines that might help as well. I went in thinking of trying a 1-day pass and walked out with having signed up. They made it easy.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Aman. We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive experience!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gold s gym in Langley is top class! Friendly and supportive staff, experienced and committed trainers, quality equipment and a facility that meets all my needs. Love it!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback about our gym! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and that you found our facilities to be great, clean, and equipped with an indoor pool. We pride ourselves on providing a welcoming and friendly atmosphere for all of our members, and were glad to hear that our staff was able to make your experience even better. We strive to maintain a high level of cleanliness in our facilities. Thankyou for being a part of community :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds has been a 5 experience for me because of my personal trainer, Michelle Sallee. She is an expert in her field and she got me to a place of wellness I never believed was possible. She has stayed with me through thick and thin.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Simi. We re so happy to hear you had a great experience at Golds Gym Langley. Your review made our day. Our team works very hard to keep our members happy, but we can only do it thanks to amazing ones like you! We hope we can keep assisting in the process of reaching your fitness goals. Thank you, Golds Gym Langley Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds has a wide variety of equipment and a large facility so there is always lots of room available. I really enjoy my workouts there.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Greetings Kerry, Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with Golds Gym Langley. We are delighted to hear that you enjoy our facility and the variety of equipment we offer. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to seeing you during your next workout. Best regards, Golds Gym Langley (604) 882-4653

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym, full equipment and the staff is very nice. Had the chance to be guided by Sidek, great experience
Super friendly front of house staff, always smiling. The gym itself is very clean and super modern with up to date equipment. By far the best gym in Langley&near by areas

Been going here for almost 4 years, it is an amazing gym. It s clean, spacious, and the equipment is great! The staff here are always kind, friendly, and truly make me feel at home. Ashton even set me up with an excellent deal, saving me money and gaining more benefits! I had no complaints about my original deal but Ashton went above and beyond to get me the best deal he could. This gym feels like family, especially with staff like Ashton always being so wonderful and welcoming!
Since joining Golds I have been impressed with the facility and staff. I 100% recommend this gym for anyone is the area looking to find an awesome place to workout.
By far one of the best gyms in BC, extremely clean and well maintained equipment by the amazing staff. Good vibes always. Highly recommended.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Golds Gym Langley. We are thrilled to hear that you find our gym to be one of the best in BC and appreciate your kind words about our staff, equipment, and cleanliness. We strive to provide our members with a clean and welcoming environment to ensure a positive experience every time they visit us. We are delighted to know that you feel this way and that you highly recommend our gym. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to continuing to provide you with excellent service and support on your fitness journey. Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: As soon as I walked in the door I was blown away!   Very impressive Facility and the staff there is incredible!  Warm and inviting, my daughter and I had a tour with David, and I was amazed on how organized and clean the gym was.  The equipment is top notch compared to what I m used to and the variety of the equipment was almost mind boggling! Mostly though I love the personal touch the staff have with the patrons and they re always keen to help! I m so happy we signed up and I would recommend to anyone wanting a amazing gym, even just a fitness community to join
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Becks! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment. We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Good space and equipment. Clean facility. The staff are very friendly and get to know their members . I am always welcomed with a smile from Jocelyn at the front!

Gold s Gym is the most inclusive and welcoming gyms I ve been too! The facility caters to all types of gym users and I am very impressed with the amenities available. Ashton made the sign up process and integration very comfortable and easygoing! He gave a thorough tour of the building and went above and beyond to demonstrate areas that would spark my interest. I really recommended if you re considering joining a gym & Ashton goes above & beyond to ensure your questions are answered! He is a very accomplished & informed representative who helps guide you based off your personal goals and needs for a transition and great gym/fitness journey!

Ive been to many gyms in my life across the country and this place is the absolute best! Im a proud member for 4 years.The facilities are very clean and upkept. Tons of machines to choose from in addition to different private spaces to do your own work outs. The staff is hands down the best in the biz; Very polite and always in a good mood. My mornings are always positive thanks to Paiges smile and sense of humour. Ive also had the chance to take some personal training sessions in the last year with Natalie and I can see and feel a huge improvement in my overall look, stamina and mental heath since Ive started. Ive built some pretty solid friendships thanks to Golds. Im really happy I chose this gym 4yrs ago. I would highly recommend Golds Gym Langley to anyone looking to join or switch from another gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Eric. Happy to hear you have been enjoying the facility and environment over the years! We are glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. We will be sure to let the entire team and Paige know what you said. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very good gym, lots of equipment and the place is well maintained and it is quite clean. Staff were a great help !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jasmyn. Thank you so much for leaving us a positive review! It means so much to us. We hope to continue bringing value to your fitness experience. - Golds Gym Langley Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: The past month being a Golds Gym member has been an absolute pleasure. The equipment is very superior and the Langley location is super spacious. During the COVID-19 pandemic, their policies are well thought out and I feel very safe working out and going to the amenities. Ashton has been a professional and great representative to his clients. He s very willing to help and he makes sure that you are well taken care of if you need any assistance. 10/10!! I would highly recommend getting a Golds Gym membership :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Maria! Happy to hear that you have been enjoying your experience, we will be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Excited to see you continue reaching your goals here, happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Always feel welcomed when I come in, the front desk girls are always so kind and smiling. Definitely recommend this gym!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review! We are delighted to hear that you have had a great experience at our gym and appreciate your kind words about our staff. We hope to continue to provide you with the best possible service and support on your fitness journey. Thank you again for your review, and we look forward to seeing you at Golds Gym Langley soon! Best regards, Sidak- Gym Manager

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gym is good, equipment availability is great. One thing about PT - Albert is the best. He always has a work around and tailors exercises and workouts exclusively to fit your need.

Golds Gym has been very accommodating throughout the pandemic, and very clean! Im in nursing so germs are a big no-no and I have observed their cleanliness - very impressed! A big shout out to David as well; he deserves a 5-star rating. Very kind and considerate of his clients - does not make you feel pressured to become a member whatsoever and checks in on you from time to time to make sure youre happy with the services golds gym offers. SO happy I chose this gym!!

With this crazy pandemic, this gym has been my only outlet! Having this gym available to me has mentally and physically kept me sane! They are very clean and always have a staff member on the floor. The front desk is SO welcoming!  The equipment is great. Everything I need in a gym! Y all are doing a great job! Keep up the good work!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: I go to this place every single day, and thats not an exaggeration. The gym is very well equipped and should suffice to what most people would need. The staff are very friendly and I always end up talking to them for a bit before and after my workouts. Kurt in particular was super helpful when he spotted one of my lifts, huge shoutout to him. The only gripe I have with this place is that the members are very bad at putting away their weights when they are done with them. This isnt the fault of the staff however and they usually try their best to clean up after the messy members.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback and review, Sean. Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment, and we will take the notes into considerations as we are always trying to improve! Glad to have you part of the Golds Gym Langley community. Happy lifting :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The staff is friendly and helpful. The facility is top notch with clean and modern equipment. All-around great experience and I would highly recommend coming here
Amazing gym, with great equipment and super nice staff :).  Would definitely recommend it, 10/10! Ask for Ashton, he really made the experience great.  Love how highly maintained the hot tub is too
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, well be sure to let Ashton know what you said! Happy to hear that youre enjoying your experience so far. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Joined Golds Gym about a month ago , I liked how it had a pool as I was paying a lot to swim each month . Read some of the reviews on the pool like it was as cold as a lake unsure what lake that guy swims in nothing wrong with the temperature. Best gym in the area by a country mile and Mary is a great personal trainer

A very special thanks to David Callahan for taking care of me and my friend during our sign up process. He is a very kind and caring individual. Im a returning member thanks to a deal offered by David. Compared to other gyms, i find the staff at this gym quite cooperative and helpful.
one of the best gyms they have a lot of different equipment to use and they re very clean

This has to be the most well-equipped and spacious gym I ve even been to, in over 20 years of working out! With their stringent COVID-19 protocols in place training feels safe, and the booking system means that the gym is never overcrowded. Which in turn means, you rarely have to wait for equipment. The staff are super friendly too. It s so nice to be acknowledged by the trainers who first signed me up each time they see me in the gym. It makes me feel like they weren t just interested in signing me up, but are keen to be a part of my journey here. Also, there was no hard upsell of personal training packages, which is a major turn off in other gyms.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We will be sure to let our entire Langley staff know what you said. Happy Lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love coming in to this gym! Staff is always super friendly and helpful and equipment and washrooms are always clean!

Great gym! Not too crowded and they have great machines. Unbelievably clean gym. You have to wipe down all your equipment after your done using it with the provided spray. Trainers and staff are great! All in all great gym!

My membership was set up by David who provided phenomenal service and got me set up really quick and easy. The gym is a great size very large and open which is especially beneficial during social distancing.  Many COVID-19 safety measure in place for their staff and gym members. Lots of equipments and different areas based on training level. Definitely recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We will be sure to let David know what you said. Happy Lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Marco is an incredibly talented and very knowledgeable trainer with years of industry experience. He has excellent communication and makes you feel like you will be able to obtain your goals no matter where you re at in your fitness journey- even if you re training from home. Most trainers with his level of experience will run you into the thousands in coaching fees, but Marco is very affordable. You will have access to years of experience and advice to tap into: at the tip of your fingers. Even though I live in another province and am only able to workout at home currently, I am able to maintain and even reach other fitness goals I didn t think were possible, thanks to Marco. Marco makes you feel invincible no matter where you are geographically or physically. You can still get fit and maintain your health.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Haley! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. So glad you have been able to surpass your goals with Marco, we will be sure to let him know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gold s is a beautiful facility with all of the amenities you could think of! All of the staff are so welcoming and friendly, even through the masks you can see their smiles. During this time with the pandemic it can be scary to be out and around many others, the staff at Gold s are wonderful in ensuring all members set their appointments and their cleaning crew is always on site cleaning after every session. Overall eral it is always a great experience at Gold s.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, well be sure to share what you said with our entire team! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Has a great assortment for equipment, the team is amazing- always will to answer any questions or help when needed. The routine of sanitation is also great and pretty much all gym-goers have good gym etiquette. Highly recommend.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Amber! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Love this gym. Super helpful staff, and a very uplifting environment!!!!!!! I train with Marco. After coming back to the gym recovering from shoulder injuries, he has helped my gain confidence and assists in finding new ways for me to work the areas of concern. This guy knows his stuff, and that makes a huge difference.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Leanne! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: During my travels I have seen a lot of gyms. This one is a good one. Its apparent its been around for a bit as the lockers had their fair share of wear but it was clean and had everything I needed. I arrived around 7:15am on a Saturday morning and had the lifting room to myself (which is nice to not have to wait for a rack). As it got closer to 8:30am, and I was in the main machine area, there were still benches available when the gym started getting busier. I never had to wait for a piece of equipment. Which for me is a big deal. Staff made it easy for a drop in, not an excessive amount of paperwork, just the basics. Well done Golds Gym Langley. When Im in town Ill be back.

Great COVID protocols, membership base is friendly and polite. The GM Dylan always says hi, and Ashton was super helpful in getting my membership set up, while pointing out that my employer also offers a corporate discount rate! Small family business feel with infrastructure of a large chain. Love coming here to stay fit!
Staff are  super friendly and helpful gym atmosphere is awesome too

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Shannon! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. We will be sure to let Marco know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: ------ Golds Gym Under New Management ----- or at least, it appears that way. I have been in a lengthy process of evaluating whether or not to commit to this gym and have been looking at other options (Fit4Less and Steve Nash are the close ones). I want to dispel any notion that Golds is run even remotely similar to the manner it was before. I had the pleasure of being accommodated by Scott and also some of the upper-management. They explained to me that there was a shift in mind-set and management culture recently after the owners (I assume?) realised that not all staff were handling customers well. They went from  (judging by the comments) pressuring, money-focused sales people to kind, friendly, non-pressuring advisers. I was given a 3 day pass (free) and then he gave me and my wife space to workout! No pressuring, no number-crunching right off the bat. Just freedom to feel out the gym. When I decided to sign up the manager who assisted me took the time to walk-through all the terms, and actually prioritized me understanding everything over getting it over it, she took her time, was friendly and ensured I was okay and on board before moving forward with every section. The contract was reasonable, competitive (compared to similar gyms, not discount gyms), and easy to understand. The locker rooms have had a huge upgrade, have lounging areas with TV;s, nice wood finish lockers, UV Saunas, and the equipment upstairs is well setup and lots of new and expensive equipment as well as the good-old free weights. Apparently they are going 24/7 soon... And getting proper crash-plates and Olympic pads... Time will tell, but even if they dont, I am so pleased with my experience. I walked out of there feeling like I just made a great decision, not feeling like I was talked into something and dumped after the bill. Would recommend any one to seriously consider this place. Its a luxury gym (not a rec centre or discount gym like Fit4Less), so dont complain about the price and compare it to those (No one shops for a Ferrari and complains it doesnt have a Civics price tag). But Steve Nash has been spamming my emails and phone non-stop since I checked it out and I felt like I was just a commission in my sales guys eyes. Go check it out. Experience the new Golds for yourself. You wont be disappointed.

I must say that It saddens me to read about previous negative feedback with Golds Langley because I absolutely love this facility! The ladies at the front desk are very friendly, some have even remembered my name- which I appreciate! I started going to Golds when my son was 3 months old and they won me over because of their a AMAZING childminding team, and care room. All of the caregivers are extremely kind and accommodating and from day one my son warmed up them all and loves coming to the gym. Now he is 1.5 years and to this day he is very comfortable here! MOMS AND DADS IF YOURE LOOKING FOR A FACILITY THAT HAS GREAT CHILDMINDING SO YOU CAN WORK OUT WITH A PIECE OF MIND, THIS IS IT! As for the rest of the gym, I have found over the last year and a bit of being here the gym has improved and they keep looking for ways to improve, constant cleaning and maintenance, different classes etc.. Thank you so much Golds Langley for making me love the gym!
Had a great experience training with Marco Banco at Golds Gym! He was knowledgeable, professional and motivating! I am looking forward to continuing my fitness journey with his help! (:

name: Fitness World

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently joined this gym and its been an outstanding experience. The manager is a gem. His excellent communication skills ensure that every member feels valued and heard. He genuinely cares about the facility and its clients, always striving to maintain a clean and well-equipped environment. I highly recommend this gym for its top-notch service and dedicated management.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was initially skeptical after hearing the negative feedback, but I decided to give it a shot and see what it was all about. I was greeted by friendly staff who were genuinely interested in helping me achieve my fitness goals. They took the time to understand my needs and provided valuable advice without pushing me into any unnecessary commitments. It was evident that they genuinely cared about creating a positive and inclusive environment for all members. The equipment at this gym is also really good, with a ton of options. The cleanliness of the gym was commendable too, and I appreciated the staffs efforts in maintaining a hygienic space. One incident that really stood out to me was when I encountered a small issue with one of the machines. I approached a staff member and they walked with me to the machine right away and then told the maintenance team. I think what sets this gym apart from other places I ve been is really the positive and motivating atmosphere. The members here are friendly and supportive, creating a sense of community that is often lacking in other gyms. The trainers are approachable and always willing to offer guidance, making sure that you get the most out of your workout routine. To sum it up, despite the negative feedback, my personal experience has been nothing but positive. I encourage anyone who might have been skeptical like I was to give it a chance. You might just be pleasantly surprised, just like I was! Overall, I highly recommend Fitness World Kingsway to anyone looking for a gym that offers quality equipment, helpful staff, and a welcoming atmosphere.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thats great to hear, Aida! Thanks for sharing your feedback of our location, and so happy to hear that youre enjoying the ecosystem!

As a beginner in the gym and not knowing much on how to get started, parinaa set me up really well with a proper routine that I can follow. Not only that, I was also set up with a well laid out nutrition plan for my goals. Through her guidance, I have finally been able to make progress as I was stuck on a plateau for far too long. Whenever parinaa passes by me in the gym, she will always make sure to check in with me and asks about my progress. Always gives me new tricks and tips to follow. Her words of encouragement are really very empowering. Her energy is what is needed for beginners like us to keep coming back to the gym. The managers and the staff there are also incredible. Great team and  a great facility. 10/10
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Love this!! Thanks for the positive review, Mitali :) :) We love being able to offer a safe & secluded space to our beloved female members as well -- glad to know youre appreciative and taking advantage of that private space as well! And who else could be better to train in the women-only section then our Queen of Kingsway trainer, Parinaa!? detailed_reviews.review_text: I just read through some of these comments and feel like an unbiased review needs to be made. Yes, it s an old building. Yes, there s some old equipment. Yes, some members don t put their weights away. Yes, bathroom in womens area is permanently out of order. Yes, parking can be difficult during the peak hours after work. But, they did just open up a brand new section with like 10 squat racks. There s a bunch of new equipment that s been added. There s another bathroom 20feet away from the womans area that works perfectly fine. The showers work. The ventilation is way better than it used to be. The staff here is maybe the highlight, one of the nicest I ve ever seen and a ton of fun to banter with. The manager is always talking to members. If you just wait 5minutes for parking a stall opens up too. I think people need to have a little perspective in life and be a little less negative. It s the cheapest membership price in the entire city but they re expecting to be pampered like Equinox. That s my two cents.

detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Love this, Martin! Glad to hear youre enjoying your sessions with Marcel! Hes humble.. a lot of people dont know this -- Marcel recently won a Vancouver Strong Man competition too! Wishing you nothing but the best with your training moving forward; keep crushing your workouts!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I was especially impressed with the staff. They were all very professional yet kind and welcoming. It made me feel less nervous and intimidated when I first started going to this gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad to know that you felt welcomed and at ease here Dee Dee. Youre officially a part of our Kingsway family now, so please let us know if theres anything we can do to make you feel even more comfortable and at home!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Can t thank this gym enough for having PARINAA as a personal trainer. She s the best with great knowledge and sweetest smile  . Her efforts are more than mine with regular checkins, delicious diet plan she provide and positivity she transfers to you. And dances like a kid after seeing you results
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We cant thank Parinaa enough for being a part of our team as well, Kiran! So glad to know youre enjoying your time with her! It truly is the team members that make Fitness World so great! Enjoy your time with her as you continue towards your fitness goals!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been training with Parinaa as my personal trainer since February. I have tried many trainers before but I stuck with no one. With Parinaa, I can say it s been the best experience and continues to be. I have lost weight, gained lean muscle mass and am generally more active. She has given me knowledge on nutrition and exercise every step of the way. I have learnt so much. Her method of progressing you slowly by building a strong base is commendable. Never have I ever missed our training session. Always pretty excited for the new challenge as she makes everything interesting. 100 percent vouch for Parinaa. You will not regret it
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: LOVE IT! Thanks for the positive feedback with Parinaa, Alam! Parinaa has quickly become one of our best/most-beloved trainers around here! Excited to hear that youve already made progress with your weight loss & muscle gain -- keep up the hard work!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Parinaa has been an incredible personal trainer for me since August. Her dedication and expertise have helped me make significant progress towards my goals. Thanks to her guidance, Ive already reduced my body fat by 6%, which is an achievement I couldnt have reached without her support. Parinaas commitment to challenging me in each workout has pushed me to my limits and taught me valuable lessons about fitness. I couldnt be happier with the results and the journey so far. I highly recommend her as a personal trainer!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Definitely one of the best reviews weve read from one of our PTs clients. Thank you for providing an in-depth and authentic review of what your experience is like when you worked with her!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I met my personal fitness trainer Emilio here, deserves all the praise in the world for his dedication, knowledge, and unwavering commitment to helping you achieve your fitness goals.
