With his guidance and expertise, youve made significant progress in your journey towards a healthier and happier life. Emilio has been your motivator, your coach, and your friend, always pushing you to go beyond your limits and achieve your full potential. From the very beginning, Emilio has been there for you every step of the way. He took the time to understand your goals and designed a customized fitness program that suited your needs and abilities. He has been your constant source of inspiration, always encouraging you to stay on track and never give up. With his support, you have been able to overcome challenges and obstacles that once seemed insurmountable. Emilios extensive knowledge and experience in the fitness industry have been instrumental in your success. He has helped you develop the right technique and form for every exercise, minimizing the risk of injury and maximizing the effectiveness of your workouts. He has also shared his wealth of knowledge on nutrition, helping you make healthy food choices that support your fitness goals. Emilio is not just a personal trainer but a life coach who has made a tremendous impact on your life. He has helped you develop a positive mindset, teaching you to believe in yourself and your abilities. He has been your role model, leading by example with his own healthy lifestyle choices. Emilio is more than just a personal trainer. He is a friend, a mentor, and a guide who has helped you become the best version of yourself. Your success is a testament to his dedication and expertise, and you are grateful for everything he has done for you.

MARCEL IS AN ABSOLUTE BEAST You know what they say when the big guys in the gym are usually the nicest and most supportive; this Strongman is a genuine person with big and strong values. He provides descriptive feedbacks and brings A LOT of motivation throughout exercises. Its obvious that he fosters physical and psychological incentives to help his clients maintain consistency as they work towards their goals. His personality kinda resembles Major Alex Louis Armstrong from FMA  Good vibes and great laughter!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Yess!! Love this, Emman! Thanks for the amazing review!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Had a pleasant experience here! Danila, the boy at the front desk was very accommodating to my questions and had all the answers I needed, the space was clean and had a broad array of equipment. As a beginner this gym was a very welcoming space to try out

Fantastic gym, staff was great and friendly, person at the front desk, Jason was super professional. First time at this location as he showed me around the gym and different types of machines/rooms. Very clear on the different type of rates the gym had, as they re super cheap and affordable.

Fitness World fosters a friendly and supportive community. The members are diverse, and everyone is united in their commitment to a healthier lifestyle. Its refreshing to be surrounded by like-minded individuals who inspire and motivate each other to achieve their fitness goals. I always leave Fitness World feeling not only physically stronger but also mentally rejuvenated.

Emilio is an excellent personal trainer and helped me learn how to dial in my fitness starting from 0. Ive been training with him for the last 6 months and have made notable gains that have surprised me. hes extremely knowledgeable, helpful, and is a down-to-earth guy to top it off. have had a great experience going here in general largely because of him.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thats awesome to hear, Nik. Glad to know youre seeing results, and having fun while achieving your goals too!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I highly recommend Tina, one of the trainers at this location. She is very passionate and knowledgeable about her art. Even after training for over a decade, I was still able to pick up a few nuggets from only an hour with her.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Min! We couldnt agree with you more as well! Tina has been an amazing addition to our team & culture here! Shes also one of our WORX trainers as well -- if you or anyone else is ever interested in a small group training session thats high-intensity and fun -- definitely attend her class!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fitness World boasts top-of-the-line equipment that caters to all fitness levels and preferences. Whether youre into strength training, cardio, or group fitness classes, youll find everything you need to achieve your fitness goals. The gym is impeccably maintained, and the equipment is modern, ensuring a comfortable and safe workout environment.

I want to say thank you to this wonderful, convenient and affordable gym. Especially, I would like to thank my personal trainer - Kathryn (Kat) L.. She in very intuitive to individual needs and has tones of experience and knowledge in fitness and nutrition. I was new to fitness and Kat helped me to build (injury free) great stamina in short time.  THANK YOU :)

The best gym in town. The manager is the biggest reason we decided to join this gym. His professionalism and openness towards new members is really something to admire. The machines are as good as new. The new section in the gym helps a lot regarding the amount of people that come to the gym.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: This is great! Thanks for sharing your feedback, Ahmad. Well continue to upgrade the facility wherever we can as well! Thanks again for the positive feedback and for being a part of our community!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Jason was great at explaining the different gym plans and provided an in depth tour of the gym when I was a new visitor. Equipment is nice and decent parking. Considering the price, a very good deal.

pretty great gym, has all the equipment you d need at the cheapest price you can find. all the workers are always willing to give tips and help out if you need. it gets a bit packed and messy at times, but which gym doesn t? if they repaired the sauna this would be the best gym

Like their women s only section.  A/C so good  Love the Normatech and the Hydromassage  Sarah was excellent in giving me a tour of the gym, answering all my questions and helping me settle in.  The friendly guy who signed me up was very patient and kind. Good team work!
I had a personal trainer, Parinaa, for several weeks. She was very personable, and fully invested in my health. Would recommend completely
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Yesss! Thanks for the positive feedback on Parinaa, Amanda! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: Updating my review... I have had the privilege for about a year. This has included a period from January to June, attending 7 Worx classes a week. Never a repeat session. Had joys of working out alongside students of all abilities. Sharing encouragement as each welcomed me into their city. Through the months, Amy has been a constant presence of care and challenges. I have reached new heights under her leadership. More recently, Tina and Paarina have joined the coaching team. Fresh ideas. High creativity. Discipline. Exchange of positive energy and humor, as my body is tested and carefully broken, sculpted and rebuilt stronger and fresh. To each of my trainers, a huge thank you! I feel amazing and very grateful of my time, with you.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the in-depth and thoughtful response Steven! And we couldnt agree more with you! The WORX classes that youre describing, truly are the BEST way for someone to get an incredible workout, guided by a personal trainer, in a small group setting, without having to pay the same $ for a 1-on-1 personal training session. So glad to know that youre taking advantage of these amazing trainers and feeling the benefits of their workouts!!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Decided to give PT instruction a shot at this location and was BLESSED with Emilio Caray. Completed an 8 week bench press program and it was BY FAR the absolute most progress I have made in such a short amount of time. 110% recommend, the results have spoken for themselves and I can safely say that Emilio s knowledge and PT experience brought my bench PR up SIGNIFICANTLY.
staff is very nice! Sabrina was a great help in my new membership pass! she was very sweet and did a great job in my tour!

It has been a great experience training with Fernando. He is an awesome trainer that pushes you to achieve your best. The gym is well equipped and the price is fair. The staff has been very nice accommodating my service dog during workouts.
Great people, and awesome service. New space for the weight room was a great addition. Emily was very welcome during my first few months as a new member!

Andrea and the rest of the staff are amazing and very welcoming at this location. I have signed up for numerous gym memberships (elsewhere) in the past, however, I had always struggled to reach my fitness goals as I had no clue about what I was doing at the gym. However, under Andreas guidance, I had not only been able to progress rapidly but feel more confident in a short span of time. She is extremely knowledgable about fitness and diet so she is an amazing person to reach out to for any fitness inquiries. It has been amazing experience training with her!

I started training with Amy in October as a complete gym novice, at 61, 170lbs, and basically 0 muscle. In just a few months of training I hit over 200lbs, drastically increasing my muscle mass without much increase in fat %. Amy helped me achieve something that honestly I would never have been able to do on my own in no time, and set me up to continue my fitness journey on my own with confidence. If youre new to fitness, lack confidence, or just want that extra help and accountability, I 100% recommend getting a personal trainer at Fitness World.

I love my gym!  This place is very versatile and can accommodate person with any level of fitness. Has area designated just for women and large bright space for fitness classes. That was important for me. Two large sections with weights and space for stretching. Very clean, great working hours and helpful friendly stuff. Definitely would RECOMMEND for a friend.

Emilio Caray is an amazing coach! I use the word coach intentionally because he is far more than a personal trainer. I have been training with him for over 2 months now with the goal of feeling better in my body every day and I feel more motivated than ever. He perfectly knew how to adapt to my level as a beginner. He put together a personalized and comprehensive workout and nutritional plan for my unique goals and has inspired me to stay disciplined and accountable by making the sessions fun and empowering me to surpass myself week after week. Emilio is knowledgeable, has the required technical training experience and is overall a great human being! I loved that he never lost sight of my vision and goals, and that he is always accessible for quick question or motivational boost. I highly recommend him. Do not hesitate to contact him, he will put his professionalism and good humour at the service of your goals!

The membership fee is affordable comparing to other gyms. They provide a women-only training area which attracts to me. All the staff in the gym are friendly. Special thanks to my personal trainer Hailey! She is an inspiring, knowledgeable, and fun trainer. Hailey is good at explaining the instruction to help me easily to understand and make the training process interesting. She monitors our lifestyle, nutrition, and progress closely to adjust our program accordingly. Not only she is training our physical work out but also enhancing our mental health.  I ve been training with her for over three months, and she encourage me to believe in myself and build up my confidence. if you have any questions, she will respond you quickly even not in the work hours and she will give you more feedback above your expectations. You always can trust her! And the most thrilling thing to me is now I enjoy my workout and it become one of my favorite exercises.

I have been exercising regularly for more than 18 months now and have thoroughly enjoyed it. The gym has a pleasant atmosphere, reasonable membership fees, and a competent staff, including Justin, Julian, and Brian, whom I frequently encounter. I have a personal trainer named Fernando, who has been amazing in helping me lose 40 pounds over the course of 5 months and gained a insane amount of nuclear through nutrition and exercising

Had a mini one-on-one training session with trainer and instructor ARIKA today.  She was absolutely amazing at showing me how to use  the new equipment in what used to be the old pool area!  She was very knowledgeable, thorough and patient with her instructions. She s also very friendly and easy to talk to.  If you re looking for a personal trainer, I highly recommend Arika!  I look forward to booking more sessions with her in the future!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome to hear, Jackie! Thanks for the positive feedback, and we agree - Arika IS amazing!! Well see you around the gym! :)

detailed_reviews.review_text: The facility is very well maintained. The staff are very friendly. But the one that s standout the most is my trainer Cyril, I ve lost 35 lbs ever since I started. He helped me to become better version of myself. Now, I am more confident than ever.

I hated the gym and I hated working out! I joined fitness world on Kingsway not knowing if Id last more than a week. I have now been going twice a week for the last couple months. The staff are amazing, the Workx classes are brilliant. Yanna is just a bundle of joy and I look forward to her class every week, Jeremy & Amy are absolutely brilliant and the staff are what make me return. Also Arika is a little gem! I did try out a different location too which had a totally different vibe, honestly if Id have gone to that location first I wouldnt have stuck with it!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the lovely comment, Kylie. You and your husband Mark have quickly become a beloved part of our community here too!! So glad to hear that youre feeling at home with the vibes here as well!! As always, please let us know if theres anything we can do for you both!

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is an awesome gym with affordable price, full of equipments for all types of exercises. Moreover, they just completed the new squat area with 6 squat racks for the squat lovers. Emilio is also a great PT who always followed up with my progress and helped me alot with my plan. Definitely recommend him to the one whos looking for not only a professional PT but also a friend

I love hitting up Fitness World for my morning workout! The Staff are friendly and fun, and the trainers are tops. I was fortunate enough to train with Matt for about a year and he developed a killer workout plan that I am still crushing to this day. The people are always courteous and there is a welcoming vibe regardless of your fitness level. I really feel the positive impact this place has had on my life.

Great gym with friendly staff. Sarah did an amazing job of explaining the membership and touring me around the facility. She was also very professional and extremely patient with my questions. They do a good job of keeping the gym clean. Don t hesitate to come by and give this gym a try and definitely ask Sarah for the help

This is a great gym to come to and I would definitely recommend this location to my family and friends. The staff create a very welcoming environment and are extremely friendly. Ive specially been helped by Sarah Ana multiple times while visiting the front desk and she is the sweetest and most helpful worker, I would definitely come back to this gym because of people like Sarah Ana.

This gym is great and everyone is really friendly. Normally Im intimidated and lost when it comes to working out, but Ive gained so much confidence thanks to my personal trainer Michelle. Shes amazing and gets the best out of me. Ive never felt as strong and empowered as I do now, and its all thanks to Michelle :)

Best fitness facility I ve ever been to. Excellent amenities, fitness classes, membership perks, fantastic staff / friendly members. Aileen at the front desk was absolutely amazing, she was warm and welcoming. This place is  located right off Kingsway next to white spot. Good gym within walking distance of restaurants. I will miss this place as I will be moving away to Bali. If I ever came back, this would be the place I would reside. Best Regards, Joseph Lieu

GREAT GYM! I ve going to this gym for almost a year. The gym is very comfortable with great machines. They have a big space on the second floor for stretching and other stuff. I had an issue with my account and the employee Maddie help me with it. She was very nice and solve my problem fast.

My personal trainer Emilio was a perfect person to share and teach the way to grow muscles and gain weight (as my specific request), also, he ensured I m following my diet plan and completing all workouts assigned to me.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Awesome to hear! Thanks for the positive feedback, Mike! We take pride in having some of the best trainers in BC!! Keep getting those gains!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love this gym! It has everything you need for a complete gym. The staff here is so friendly and helpful. My personal trainer Kieran Kelly is the best. Hes really invested in helping anyone who wants to be a better version of themselves. The level of enthusiasm shown by Kieran for his clients including me is unmatchable. I managed to go from 20% body fat to 13% all thanks to his training with proper techniques.
Great gym, affordable prices. Handsome man behind the desk was very helpful during the gym tour, happy I picked this over Club16!

Ive been coming to Fitness World for a little over 2 months now! I wanted to start working out and become fit for a long time, but had issues committing and also: gym anxiety. TL;DR: Fantastic gym, even greater personal trainers! I decided to get a personal trainer to hold myself accountable. Hailey K. is a fantastic PT: she not only helps me with my workouts, but also guides my nutrition. She encourages me to push myself harder, and accommodates and understands my bodys limits. Furthermore, shes available to answer my questions outside of PT hours via text message, which is incredible! I really appreciate her hard work, and her fun, positive energy. Ive made progress in both my strength and my confidence by leaps and bounds since I started training with her (and committing to the gym!). As for the gym itself, its well-maintained and the staff are all very friendly. Ive never had any issues with the equipment. I was also able to reach out to the staff for help on some of the machines. This gym is at a great location, with a supplement store right next door. Its a walk away from both the mall, and transit (bus+train).

Am new to this FW.  It has a terrific vibe.  The staff are welcoming and seriously helpful.  Today a staffer was helping set up a workout station for a member. Havent seen that before.  And that positive vibe has spread to the members.  Very friendly.  The gym has a number of separate areas that make it seem smaller and not so imposing.  Just a great place to work out.

Great gym - spacious, has plenty of machines of all kinds, as well as free weight equipment. Membership prices are very affordable (as twice as less than that of GoodLife while the overall gym quality is at the same high level). There are also various group classes offered and a women-only area (cant speak of it though, as Ive never been there  ). Free guest parking is available as well (though not too big, so you might spend a while looking for a free spot during busy hours). The maximum subscription also includes the guest access option, when you can bring a friend with you for free (as many times as you want)! Plus, they offer 3 free admissions to try&see. Definitely recommend.

I ve been coming here for about 4 months now and I ve never felt more comfortable in a gym! It s a clean and tidy gym with a great environment and employees. I decided to try out personal training and Mary is fantastic!! I m in the best shape I ve ever been. She has great knowledge on nutrition, workouts, and incredible energy. Once you tell her your goals she ll make sure you hit them and helps you strive for greatness. Fonzo, who I did my trial for personal training with, helped make such a great pairing and set me up with Mary! Their team is fantastic and makes the gym not so scary for beginners! :)

A great gym that is clean, organized and remarkably welcoming. All of the staff are encouraging and always willing to help out with anything you may need. I highly recommend this gym, especially considering the lite price.

Ive been a member here for over a month now and special thank you to my personal trainer Emilio Caray! He is chill and fun to be with during training, and most importantly, I highly appreciate the program that he designed for me to help achieve my goals in athleticism. The program plans out all the exercises for each training session that are tailored to my needs and it even contains different phases as I progress over time. Over the course of a month, I have already seen significant results by following this workout program and nutrition guides: 4 pounds of muscle gain and 1.3% loss of body fat. This further motivates me to stay active and continue working hard towards my goals.

Great Gym! It is clean, well stocked and maintained. The atmosphere is very inviting, the staff, managers take time to acknowledge their gym members and make them feel welcome. The gym has a variety of equipment, including free weights, squat racks and machines.
Shauna, Brian, and Jason were extremely friendly and helpful! Especially Shauna she deserves a raise! This location has really good customer service and will for sure be coming back.
The new add on is fantastic! Squat racks and platforms for days! Highly recommend. The staff are pretty cool too!
Daniel is the best personal trainer at fitness world Kingsway. He brought me from 22%bf to 17%BF in 3 months. And my strength went from 30lb for lat pull down to 60lb. And he works a lot on form.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We couldnt agree with you more, Howie! So glad to hear that youre enjoying your PT experience with Dan! Keep getting those gains!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The gym is very budget friendly. Staff members are very friendly and always welcoming to hear your problems out. Special thanks goes out to this one of the best personal trainer Fernando. If you are looking for someone who can be a friendly trainer who can boost you to achieve your fitness goals, help you out with your nutrition plans and do continuos follow ups  and get you a work out plan understanding your body properly then Fernando is the one you should get in touch for PT sessions. He not only provides you with workout plans but focuses on proper exercise positions so that you do not have any kind of injury post workout. Plus point of having him around is if you are having a bad day then he is the one who will ensure you leave the gym with a smiling face. He is flexible to help you out post gym hours too with your doubts and explains them in a very subtle easy to understand manner and always provides realistic approaches to your goals.

AMAZING GYM, AMAZING WORKOUTS! The staff here is incredibly friendly and extremely qualified! Fernando know how to push you to the limit in the best way and professional manner with your possible workouts. You will not leave disappointed! Such a family vibe as soon as you walk in the doors   I highly recommend checking this gym out.

Andrea has been a great personal trainer for me to start here! She always motivated me to come in the gym! without her I wouldnt have come as often and achieved as much as I did. She helped me with my protein intake and my meals too

Just started my membership at this gym not to long ago. Love the environment here. The front desk staff are always so kind and welcoming. Aileen has especially been a really big help in adapting to the gym.
Jason at the help desk is super friendly and welcoming. Great gym, would recommend!

It has been a great experience training with Emilio. He is cool and an awesome trainer. My goal was to lose my weight and he supported me to achieve that goal. I will definitely get PT again with him. Thank you Emilio

Great gym. Friendly and helpful staff. J.P is always friendly and goes out of his way to help and motivate people. Feryal and Sarah always make you feel welcome at the front desk and Janice is just the best! Highly recommended joining this gym.....if not why even bother going?

Im in love with this gym. Mary Liu is my personal trainer and she is amazing! I have never been consistent with the gym and now Im going 3-4 times a week. If you are looking to get into fitness, I highly recommend her, the workouts are fun.

Good training environment, equipment is legit and the staffs are extremely friendly. Kieran, Hailey, Matt, Julian and Justin are the the best supportive staffs around. Highly recommend this gym to anyone.

The staff are always nice and helpful; the gym is  pretty clean and is a safe place for everyone. I ve been training with Hailey for a few months and she s amazing! She s a very professional coach and an inspirational person. Would 100% recommend her to all of my friends!
Danila and Justin were both very helpful with me today. I highly recommend reaching out to them for any questions regarding training at the Kingsway location.

Went to Fw burnaby location. Along kingsway. Friendly staff, clean equipments, staff are very helpful. I walked in the gym and i was greeted by their staff. Im just beginning my fitness journey. First time visiting this gym. I was happy i went to this location. I met one of their staff name Justin.  he gave me a tour of the facility and gave me information about their program.  I i was embarassed not knowing how to use any of the equipments but Justin made me feel comfortable, taught me the basics to start. Very knowledgeable. I would recommend this gym to friends and family.

I started with Fitness World and decided to get some Personal Training with ANDREA. It was the BEST DECISION! I have tried to start the gym lots of times before and always ended up quitting, for the first time I have seen progress and have a plan so I am not wasting time in the gym anymore.

Great Gym. I am 100% the parking lot is always full because non-clients park there, but that just comes to show how    incredibly positive and friendly the team is. I had never taken personal training until I signed up at fitness world Kingsway. Jodie has been with me since day one and boy is she the best personal trainer. She is definitely the best  personal trainer in this location. I used to not be able to do a single push-up, now I ca do 30 or 40 in a row, no problem
Jeremy is the best pt, patient and kind with his clients, and Justin is excellent at front desk and amazing at costumer service, very friendly staff that are really helpful and non judgmental
Cool gym, great atmosphere, and all the staff are super helpful, Danila, Justin and Julian help me all the time!
Been going here for a while, love the gym very spacious and there s always a pt to help out on the gym floor!

I have been training with my trainer Cyril for about 4 months now and he is such an amazing trainer and very professional,knowledgeable, supportive and inspirational. Most importantly he always pushes me to go above and beyond my limits and also he keeps in touch with me to check whether I am on right track. I am glad to choose Cyril as my personal trainer and look forward to continue my fitness journey with him.Cyril is the best and I highly recommend him to anyone who needs guidance to achieve their fitness goals.
Nice fitness place. The facilities are great. I usually come early morning because later gets busy. The staff is awesome. Sarah was very kind and helpful with any inquiries.

Great environment, friendly staff, would 100% recommend this gym to everyone. Ive been training with Fernando for a while now and he always keeps me on track. Whether its training or nutrition, he always pushes me to my highest potential. Even the most basic exercises would seem tough to me, but looking at how far Ive come with the training makes me more excited for gym sessions. Fernando keeps me motivated at all times, he takes his time explaining the form of the exercises and keeps the workouts interesting by switching them up once every while. I am becoming more comfortable and confident with my body shape and strength, and I thank him for that!

I ve had an excellent experience training with Kat here, I can say she s one of the best trainers I ve worked with so far! She really takes the time to get to know you and your body. My favorite aspect about working with Kat is that she tailors the program not only to my goals, but also in consideration of my physical weaknesses and my abilities. For example, we worked on improving my squat form because she noticed one of my legs have tighter tendons than the other. My form was better after day one! Kat is funny, energetic and above all super motivating! She has my absolute recommendation!

Awesome gym! Ive been training with Jodie for a few weeks now and shes always been patient with me and pushes you enough for a great workout!   Absolutely lovely staff! Friendly and easy to talk to if theres any issues that come up and i think thats what makes this gym great
Very well kept gym nice and clean with a wide range of equipment. The front desk lady, I think it was Sarah, was particularly helpful and friendly on my first visit there. Will be returning regularly
Gym is very nice, Danila is one of the best employees I ve ever seen!
Membership fee is cheap. Staff are friendly. When we register, Julian helps us a lot. And the trainers are professional. Highly recommend Hailey who is really nice and passionate. Overall is awesome!

I have been training with Kieran for 3 months and simply one of the best trainers, this person checks up on you keeps you on track and helps you achieve your goals period. Although I am not a very motivated person. But over the last 3 months I see great strength improvement and just feel better about myself! Amazing place!

This gym is incomparable the environment that the staff bring is not only kind, welcoming and interactive but also extremely comedic, supportive they truly care about your fitness. I highly recommend this gym to anyone who is looking to change their lives.
Great gym with lots of equipment and helpful staff! I was a member for 8 months and trained with Caroline. I lost 18 pounds with her help. She is amazing!

I cannot say thank you enough to my awesome personal trainer, Hailey Kim  . During the Covid time, I gained so much weight and no exercise for years.. and without her help, I would have stayed the same. Her knowledge and her passion towards being healthy helped me so much not only to lose weight but also being healthy. Because of her, I ve got the courage to exercise,the healthy lifestyle and most importantly how to enjoy the workout!!!!! I am amazed how my body has been changed just by listening to HER. I had another personal trainer 5 years ago from different gym (not Fitness World) before I met Hailey. Not trying to compare, but I know for the fact that what I learned this time and before there are huge differences. She knows how to motivate ppl and that is super important especially if you are new to this. If you ever need a personal trainer, you should look for Hailey Kim. She is just amazing. Thank you so much Fitness World and Hailey

My trainer is Caroline, and shes wonderful with great customer service skills. Although I was skeptic about their services in general, I was pleasantly surprised with the overall experience and the variety of equipments. The staff is extremely friendly and accommodating.

Been training with Cyril for over a year now. Lost 25 pounds and concentrating on developing my core. He s an excellent trainer and works really hard to find an exercise that suits your body and flexibility. He continuously updated the routine which never makes gym boring. Will always motivate you and pushes you to be at your best! Great experience!

I completed a few training sessions with Jodie and believe she is an amazing trainer. She is kind, patient and extremely knowledgeable. I can say that Jodie genuinely cares about her clients as she was able to carefully listen/answer my questions even after each session had been completed. I learned a lot from Jodie - she taught me how to do each exercise correctly with form, helped me come up with workout plans and gave me a lot of informative tips. She definitely helped push me out of my shell and I feel more confident in myself when it comes to heavier lifting now. I really enjoyed my sessions with her and definitely plan to take more with her in the future!

name: Gold's Gym University Market Place
address: Gold's Gym University Market Place, 2155 Allison Rd, Vancouver, BC V6T 1T5

detailed_reviews.review_text: A great gym with good equipment and friendly staff. The main reason for the review is to flag how helpful Yash Modi was for myself and my partner. As a member of the gyms staff, he was incredibly friendly, informative and provided great advice around membership. Would recommend asking for him if youre looking for membership information.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Rupert. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds gym has an amazing environment for people anywhere along their gym journey. The staff are really friendly. The fitness consultant shaiyan has a lot of knowledge and gives great tips to plan my workout.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Advay. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us. Warmly, Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: the customer service here was amazing: front desk was super receptive even though I was new to this gym! Will definitely be considering joining :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Nikita. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Gold s Gym University Market Place. Kindly, Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Excellent customer service by Shaiyan!! He was extremely patient and understanding, and did his best to provide a personalized membership option best-suited for my needs. Much appreciated!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Jashelle. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold s Gym University Market Place Team.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I moved to Vancouver while the Covid-19 lockdown was ongoing from Ontario. I wanted to get back to the gym ASAP. Golds BC offered me a good deal in May for multi-access across all Golds Gyms in BC, which would activate once the gyms were allowed to reopen. I first used the West Broadway facility before the UBC location reopened. The UBC location is great. It has everything I need. The staff are friendly. Not hard to register a spot (right now you need to make a reservation to workout), since the location isnt crowded. I think the company is doing pretty good considering the circumstances.

I ve never felt so welcomed and comfortable at a gym before! Everyone there is so kind. I have to give a special shout-out to someone who has been exceptionally welcoming. Ariana is one of the personal trainers there and she has helped me tremendously with my fitness journey. She is very knowledgeable and easy to connect with. Highly recommend her to anyone who is looking to get into working out for the first time!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were happy you enjoy your gym membership at our UBC location Michelle, thank you!

detailed_reviews.review_text: The atmosphere of the gym is so good . But more importantly is the trainers . I have been trained with Ariana for more than 30 sessions . She is so professional , patient and friendly, just made each session so much fun ! Really enjoy my personal traning here with her !

Has been working out here for more than 5 years and the equipment is always clean. Mike Zhang helped me to get the best plan and has been giving me so many constructive advice for body building. Way better experience comparing to Bird Coop as there s little to no waiting time here. Really recommend it to bring friends

Bryan Wong coached me and guided me through my peak into a powerlifting meet. He was super nice, down to earth, helpful, and most of all, motivating. Bryan checked up on me regularly even on off-days.  He helped me become more efficient in my lifts and set me up for success. Bryan offered to handle my meet for free and guided me to a Bronze medal.

Best gym I have ever been to. Just got my membership a month ago, along with the most amazing personal trainer. I have never felt so at home at a gym before. With the help of Ariana s knowledge and welcoming attitude, it did not take me long to feel fully immersed in the golds community. Just over two weeks into my training with Ariana I was already seeing major improvement in my strength and overall fitness. If you want to really push your fitness to the next level I recommend you see Ariana at golds!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Makayla! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Legitimately one of the best gym environments I ve been in, here s why: The front desk staff are extremely courteous and chirpy so they never fail to put you in a good mood before you step in the gym. The trainers are VERY knowledgeable and are happy to offer advice to anyone who is interested , just ask ! The management team is also proactive in making sure the members  needs are being met and take member feedback very seriously. Overall, a great environment with awesome people who GENUINELY care about you. I d recommend anyone reading to check it out when they can!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Aarya! We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your entire experience with us and will be sure to let the entire team know what you said. Glad to have you part of the community, happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have been training with Bryan Wong for about 4 months and the experience has been amazing! Bryan has great communication skills and truly cares for his clients. He has a keen eye for assessing his clients fitness and effectively communicates long-term and short-term goals for his clients with realistic strategies to achieve them. He makes it easy to understand the reasons for each exercise and the metrics for keeping track of progress. He also has very clear explanations for correcting postures and avoiding injuries which are especially important for weight training. I am very happy with the quality of PT provided by Bryan and Golds Gym. As for the gym, it is very clean and offers a wide variety of equipment. The staff are very friendly and members are conscientious. I would highly recommend Golds Gym UMP for people interested in fitness and are either studying at UBC or living on campus.

Such a good gym, the staff and trainers are all so friendly and are willing to help when you need it. The equipment is always super sanitized and they have great protocols in place to make sure that people are being safe and sanitary because of COVID-19. There is a wide array of equipment and many squat racks for people to use which is nice since not many gyms have this luxury. I would definitely recommend this gym to anyone!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Diya! So happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far and excited to see you reach your goals with us. Happy Lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I love training at Golds University Market Place! The facilities are always clean and the staff here are always welcoming. Training with Ariana as my PT has played a pivotal role in achieving my own personal fitness goals. Ariana tailors my program to my needs and is constantly challenging me, training with her has certainly developed my confidence in working out at the gym. Ariana is awesome, highly recommend!

Absolutely love it here !! I actually wake up looking forward to the gym . I havent been to a gym in 5 years so was a bit nervous starting up but all the staff are so nice and professional. Sam is amazing and made me feel really comfortable! Today I got a free personal training hour with Sasha, which was really helpful. Definitely recommend this gym
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Lorna! So happy to hear that you feel comfortable here, we will be sure to let Sam and Sasha know. We re excited to watch you start achieving your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds is my favourite gym, especially their personal trainers   Ariana is the best personal trainer I have ever had, honestly! She is so professional, skilled, friendly, and never made me feel silly for being weak or new. Because of her, my confidence is boosted, I look and feel so much healthier, and I enjoy gymming.

Solid environment and culture here, went in for a trial session yesterday and I can t remember his name, but the manager I dealt with was very chill, hospitable and respectful all around. The utility here did not meet my needs unfortunately with my training focused more on bodybuilding, I feel that these gyms could use some more functional equipment (cable crossovers predominantly) but I would definitely recommend this gym to any powerlifters or beginners 100%.

I ve been working out here for a few months now. I can honestly say that I really enjoy working out at this gym, the majority of the staff are very kind and helpful, whenever I ask questions or have concerns they are quick to help. Their cardio machines are really new and easy to use. They have a good variety of equipment and I always leave there feeling healthy and refreshed. It is a super friendly environment and I find it easy to go to with little intimidation which I find a lot in other gyms. There are also less crowds than all of the gyms on campus, which is awesome!

Ive been a member since 2017 and I can definitely say that Golds UBC is one of the most welcoming environments to train in! The gym itself has such a great community and a huge part of this is due to their staff. Alex S. is there almost every time I go in and is always so friendly and welcoming. He always is able to answer any fitness related questions with constructive advice and is so motivating! His positive attitude and encouragements make my morning workouts so much better and its great to see a friendly face. Overall, the staff here are absolutely phenomenal, the equipment is great and I am so happy that I have found such a positive gym environment that is also involved with the community at large! Definitely worth checking out!!

I absolutely love this gym and the staff. Being my first time ever at the gym, these guys made me feel welcome and supported. My trainer Sasha is just exceptional and I am very grateful for her! The gym is also clean and spacious. I 10/10 recommend this gym!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, Elsie! We will be sure to let Sasha know what you said, we are happy to have you part of our community! Happy lifting.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds gym university market place is a wonderful gym with an amazing gym environment plus great staff! Ariana has been nothing but amazing throughout my fitness journey and without her I don t think I would be where I am at today! Her support and knowledge has helped me tremendously. The tips I have learned from Ariana has made a huge difference in my training and I can definitely see a big growth in my progress! if you plan on joining this gym and are looking for a personal trainer I would 100% recommend Ariana! :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to be your #1 gym in UBC Andrea!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Went to this location as I was in the area and was amazed with the atmosphere I walked into. Being new to the gym I needed some assistance with a few things and a PT named Ariana was above and beyond with helping me with the whereabouts in the gym and even gave me some tips to boost my workout. She was amazing and was impressed that she was willing to help on her own time to ensure I had the best experience.

Golds gym has definitely been a positive turning point in my fitness journey. I started training with personal trainer Sasha Duncan at the beginning of the year, and I can honestly say that I continue to use her advice and teaching in every workout since. Sasha is very dedicated to her work as a trainer and her ability to effectively share her knowledge with beginners like me is extremely valuable! I was able to learn the foundational steps needed to achieve my fitness goals, and saw my form improve greatly. If you are looking for a knowledgeable and supportive trainer, I would definitely recommend Sasha Duncan!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad to hear Veronica! Happy youre enjoying UBCs top gym - Golds Gym University Marketplace!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I recently joined this gym! I have worked out at many gyms but I really felt at home when I started working out here! The staff is so friendly and they have all the equipment you need to get a great workout in. Perfect open spaces and their covid policies are superb. Thank you Golds Gym! Super good value!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: All of the staff and especially the managers Sam and Kyle are super great and ive had nothing but amazing service! seeing them every workout is the highlight of my day!! Ariana Zandi is one of the best trainers out there and I really enjoyed training with her! She really connects with her clients, pays attention to your strengths and challenges you. Love her will definitely train with her again :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Olivia! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you as part of the community. Well be sure to let everyone know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: This is a very warm and welcoming gym. Most of the clients are university students or people living in the neighborhood. Both the staffs and clients are so friendly, making the entire environment comfortable. Talking about PT, I have been trained under Ariana s instructions for the past two months, and I absolutely love how professional and inspiring she is! I wasn t new to gym and I was trained under two different PTs before. Comparing my past and recent experiences, I think Ariana is the type of PT that truly spends time planning out systematic schedules to fulfill clients  needs rather than throwing random stuffs from days to days. Since day 1 of the training, she has already awaken my muscles and strength for compound exercises which were scheduled weeks later. She is able to provide easy-to-follow instructions and detail suggestions for further improvement. She definitely pushes me to challenge myself more. I couldn t be able to imagine how much I have accomplished within such a short period of time. I used to go to gym just for the sake of  health  and I struggled mentally every single time. However, I really enjoyed my times working out in the gym this two months, and even looking forwards to attending specific  interesting  sessions haha. Overall, if you are looking for a PT who is both professional and fun to talk with, I would highly recommend Ariana to you!

Sasha Duncan is an amazing personal trainer; hands down one of the best Ive worked with and Ive worked with many coaches and trainers over the years. She thoughtfully tailors my workouts to my abilities and goals, continually pushes me, and easily switches gears on the fly if need be. She shares her fitness knowledge in ways that are easily understood and put into action, and her enthusiasm for weight training is contagious. I definitely look forward to our training sessions, especially during these difficult pandemic times.

Nice gym with a large range of equipments. I train with Matthew H (PT) and have had very good experience with him. Super accommodating and professional. I like that he keeps track of my progress through Google Drive so I can have access anytime. He s also very responsive about any fitness question I have outside of our training sessions. The gym also adheres to strict COVID guidelines per the provincial instruction, which I appreciate very much.

I have been going to this gym for almost a year now and the staff are not only professional, kind and knowledgeable but never fail to greet me in an upbeat and positive way. The environment at the gym itself is always clean and sanitized properly by staff (which is extremely important right now during the pandemic). This is a great gym! Special shoutout to Sam and the rest of the front desk team who make going to Golds UBC a great experience.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community here. Well be sure to let Sam and the entire team know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Been going to this gym for years and it s worth your money! Covid safe and friendly staff. Wide variety of equipment and also has an Olympic Platform with kilogram plates for Olympic weightlifters. Although there are 35 people limit for each session, people usually cancel last minute so I havent been stressing out about booking an appointment with them! Awesome gym :)
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Niki! We are grateful to have you as a valued member over the years. Excited to have you continue reaching your goals with us, happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gym is good, I ve been working out here for more than 2 years. Just hope you can stop playing Hardstyle EDM in the future please!!! It s really disturbing. Appreciate!

I know Gold s Gym always provides quality machines for a great workout  but the one thing that definitely stands out is their customer service. I believe her name is Cassandra but she s always such a pleasure to deal with. I really hope they continue to hire quality people like her. It makes a difference !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Kasia! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and community so far! We will be sure to let Cassandra and the entire team know what you said. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Amazing gym, makes me look forward to working out!! Began working out here as soon as the gym reopened in July and my experience has been nothing less than exceptional. The measures taken to ensure safety and cleanliness in the location are admirable. Thankful for the atmosphere and friendliness from everyone, both staff and other members, they make working out at Golds UMP an absolute pleasure :)

Going to the gym has always been important to me, but with COVID I was quite sceptical as to which gyms would be taking protocols seriously and effectively allowing people to workout while following the guidelines. The management and staff are incredibly welcoming, and they are following protocols very tightly, and have been able to create a safe environment for people to workout during this pandemic. I recommend Golds gym to all of my friends and family, and many have signed up and love going. I 100% recommend anyone looking for a gym to give Golds Gym a try!!

Starting a fitness journey can seem like a difficult task, but personal trainer Sasha Duncan has always shown it to be simple and fun! Her workouts are made specifically to target areas you need to improve and are truly effective. I ve seen huge imrpovements in my overall mobility, strength and confidence at the gym! She listens very well and is able to adapt any workout instantly to best suit her clients. Amazing experience!

The absolute best part of this gym is the group power class. The instructors are so awesome and inspiring and make you excited to come back!!! Since playing competitive sports in high school, I hadnt found a way to exercise that was sustainable in terms of how much I enjoyed it, affordability, time, impact on body, etc. but group power has been so amazing for me, and I have to give credit to Jen and other instructors for making it such a positive experience for everyone. I would recommend to anyone!!!

I joined the gym while i was working in the area last summer. great equipment and everything was really well maintained. What really put it over the top for me though was the fact that their trainer Kyle took the time to answer any questions I had before signing up, and even checked in with me regularly afterwards to make sure i dint have any issues with anything. Great guy and great service 10/10

Ariana has made my first personal training experience absolutely incredible. She helped to identify numerous muscle imbalances and both supported, and pushed me in the gym. Her training program allowed me to improve my form, and gain strength and confidence. Ariana is an incredible addition to the gold s team and I am so grateful to have had knowledge and expertise to support my fitness journey.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Caroline! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment and personal training here. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Probably one of the best gyms I ve been to in Vancouver, and I ve tried many (Steve Nash, Club 16, community centres, etc.). The gym is well-maintained as the washrooms and machines are always clean. I also feel safe working out at Golds UBC because the max capacity is 30 people, and the machines are spread out enough for me to have my own space. Additionally, the staff is very welcoming and approachable, unlike other gyms. I highly recommend this gym !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback, Bern! We are happy to hear you have been enjoying your experience with us so far, we will be sure to let the entire team know what you said. Glad to have you part of our community here, happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: My experience at Gold s Gym at ubc has been nothing but amazing! Working with personal trainer Ariana has been the best decision I ve made. Ariana is extremely knowledgeable in terms of not only training but also nutrition, and she really tailors your sessions according to your fitness goals. One hour flies by when you re training with her because she s super personable but also so efficient with the time! I ve already learned so much from the four sessions we ve had so far and I ve never felt so motivated to become healthier and stronger. I would highly recommend Gold s gym, especially personal training with Ariana!

This is seriously the best gym ever!!! The staff here are extremely accommodating and friendly. Not only do they all welcome you when you arrive, but by name! The facility is always very clean and all of the machines are new and work very well. I love my membership here!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback and review, Rochelle! Happy to have you part of our community. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds Gym UMP is awesome! The staff are super friendly and they always make you feel welcome. They have all the equipment you need and have COVID precautions in place to make sure you feel safe when working out. I would highly recommend this gym to anyone!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Ryan! Happy to hear that you feel at home with us. We will be sure to let the whole team know what you said. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Training with Michelle (PT) is one of the best thing happened to me this summer! Ive been training with Michelle regularly for 2 months now, and it felt really good. I become more energetic everyday. She is so sweet and easygoing, and most of all, she is very caring of my experience. I would recommend her to anyone who is new to gyms or who is professional. Also, on the days I don t train with her, she would always instruct me via message. She would give honest opinions, motivates you, and gives recommendations on healthy diets. When the first time I went to Michelle, all I wanted what to lose weight. Right now, I want to build muscle and strength and look fit and healthy. She really changed my idea of a  perfect body . Overall, working out is fun and my body is becoming more fit and proportionate. I am more than happy. golds gym        3                       gym               nice                                                Michelle      nice                                                                                                                                               gym gym              gym           Michelle

Went to this gym throughout my time at UBC and still going to this day. This gym has everything you need: free weights area, guided machines, cardio stations and a studio. The staff is always welcoming and friendly, the PTs are knowledgeable and Kyle the manager is always making sure the operation is running smoothly. They have also doubled down on cleaning and sanitization amid COVID and the additional precautions they have taken to prevent the spread of the virus definitely make me feel safe working out there. Best gym in the area by far!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Thibault! Great to hear that you enjoyed your time with us during school and beyond. We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said and excited to see you continue reaching your goals here. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I worked with a personal trainer here, Bryan for a few weeks. I felt that the gym offered a good selection of equipment, plenty of space, and seems to have many kind people working there. Id definitely recommend the personal training sessions if you can afford to try them out, they help alot with learning technique for preventing injuries & do a great job of showing you new ways to train.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Michael, happy to help and be your UBC gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I strongly recommend this place! The gym could be busy sometimes, but the people there are super nice. Ariana is an amazing personal trainer, I would give her 10 out of 5 if I could!!

Love this gym, got all the equipment you could ever need. Staff members like Emmanuel make Golds UMP an extremely safe and fun place to workout during Covid-19. Super supportive and also made the sign up process quick and easy. Happy to be back
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad youre happy Rohan! We pride ourselves at being UBCs top gym!  Were here to help with any questions on your best UBC gym membership.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Started coming here since the start of 2021 and have been pretty satisfied with what the gym has to offer in terms of the equipment. Recently started working with my personal trainer Bryan Wong who has been greatly helping me out a lot in terms of how to structure my workouts, pace them and with proper technique. And with a solid resume to back it up. Kind of wish I started doing PT when I was a lot younger now.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy to hear Kevin - were proud to be a top UBC gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I joined the gym with 7 other friends over year ago and we have been working out at this location ever since. The gym is very clean and spacious compared to other choices on campus. The service has changed from mediocre to very satisfying ever since they brought new management to this place a couple of month ago. The prices became transparent and competitive, the issues I addressed were resolved in a timely manner as well. Overall I should say this is a very good and professional gym and will recommend my friends to come as well.  -  2014/12/10 Eric Jia

What has definitely impacted my experience at Golds is having Ariana there as a personal trainer. She is the one person who pushes me to my greatest ability when I think that Im not strong enough, she pushes me and motivates me. Ariana is undoubtedly one of the greatest assets to Golds and I genuinely would not be so determined on improving myself if it wasnt for her! Best PT!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Lara! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: If you want to get a head start on your fitness goals and get a better physique, come to Golds Gym UMP and talk to the manager Milos Ristic. He will explain everything to you with respect and patient, he will help you to set up your goals and give you tips on how to achieve them. If you also consider to have a personal trainer, Ian Standish I suggest. He is one of their best trainers, I started working out with him since March 2019, and we made a lot of progress in the last 3 months. He is experienced and well organized. He keeps tracking on my strength and cares about how I feel through out the workout. He makes small changes to our workout every session  and encourages me to push harder. I have had a great experience here with these people,  and Im very excited to have my next body composition test on June 1st, and see how much progress I have made.

Great gym located conveniently at UBC which is great for an early morning workout before classes or after evening classes. The best part of this gym is the amazing group fitness classes and instructors. You can tell that they really care about delivering fantastic workouts and put a lot of energy into each and every class. The instructors promote an inclusive workout environment by showing modifications so that everyone feels successful in their classes. I highly recommend trying group power, as it is your one stop shop in regards to a workout class.

This Golds Gym location is a little smaller than other locations, catering to students and locals in the UBC area. UPDATED** Current letting 40 members in the gym at a time and no more booking system. Tap in with your fob and workout when you want! Live tracker is available on the website for each location. YOU CAN STAY up to 1 hours and 45 min during non peak times, 1 hours and 15 min during peak times. UMPs peak times run Monday-Thursday 12-730 pm and Friday Saturday after 12 until about 7. Sundays are mostly dead. Front desk staff track your workout time when you check in and will give you a heads up if they have a line waiting and you need to exit... You can always tap out, jump back in line and workout again tho. Cleaning is on point, compared to other facilities the team uses a cleaning log to ensure every 15 MINUTES different areas of the gym are sanitized. Its still mandatory to wear your mask inside, so come prepped with an active wear mask rather than a heavy cotton one. (you can buy viral off Golds Gym branded masks at the front desk) They also now sell a variety of Golds Gear, visit the website for more info and pics :)

Ariana is hands down the most supportive and dedicated personal trainer I ve ever met. She s supported me through my fitness journey from the very beginning and continues to push me and believe in me. Without her, I wouldn t have the confidence nor the motivation I have now in the gym. Training at Gold s would not be part of my daily routine if it wasn t for Ariana. If you ever need a PT, Ariana s your girl.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Meilee! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed my time so far at this gym! They have a decent selection of equipment and machines and the staff are very friendly and helpful! Also, the facility is kept very clean and sanitized, which is extra important now with all of the COVID-19 guidelines in place.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Landon! Happy to hear that you have been enjoying your experience with us so far and feel safe while training. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Being a member since 2017, I began to work out with my personal trainer, Michelle Marin recently. I ve done personal training before, but she is the most wonderful trainer I ve ever met. She fully understands my fitness goal and she plans the process successfully. I m very satisfied with working out with her, and totally recommend her to anyone.

I switched to gold s in January because I was tired of poor service from the other nearby gyms and I could not be happier! The staff is very friendly, professional, and helpful. Finding spots is easy and sanitisation levels are top notch. 10/10 would recommend!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the feedback, Anant! We will be sure to let the entire team know what you said, we are happy to have you part of our community and looking forward to seeing you achieve your goals here. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: I signed up recently and wasnt quite familiar with the booking system. The staff here, especially Cassandra, has been more than accommodating and patient in guiding me through the whole process. She made the whole process super easy for me. Safety precautions are also great, and Ive never had any issues with cleanliness or social distancing.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the feedback and review, Barry! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. We will be sure to let Cassandra and the team know what you said. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Bryan Wong was my personal trainer and he was super helpful! He is easy to get along with and very knowledgeable. I had no experience with powerlifting but Bryan quickly taught me how to safely do the specific lifts I wanted to learn, as well as many general tips about lifting and bodybuilding. Training with Bryan was definitely a great experience!

One of the Best Gyms Ive worked out. The staff was really catering to my needs and was polite and understanding, when I asked for help on how to use machines, the PT staff, (I think his name was Jorge) was helping me use equipment I was not familiar with. Would definitely come back for a workout next time Im in town.

What an amazing place. The fitness instructors are so professional and positive. Huge thanks to Jen, Ella, Suzie and Janice for being such a hard working team. I love these classes. I also enjoed personal trainers i had here. Thank you  Candice and Raven.

Wide variety of equipment and layout is easy to navigate. Staff are always friendly and welcoming; familiar faces such as Alex Savanovic have made it their goal to establish great customer service as well as friendships with every member who walks in. Ultimately a solid gym experience.

Bryan was my personal trainer and he was awesome. Really easy to get along with and quickly figured out what I needed to do to accomplish my goals. It was clear that he knew what he was talking about and was able to help me in a lot of ways. He kept our sessions fun but also maintained a level of professionalism as well. Highly recommend Bryan if youre looking for personal trainer at Golds.

Gold s Gym has really changed my lifestyle and my self-image. Simply going to the gym four times a week has made me a healthier and happier person. Two years ago, I was breathless climbing up a flight of stairs, but now I feel much stronger and my stamina has increased beyond belief. My wife and son also go to Gold s, so the Gym has become a family affair. The management and staff are wonderful, and always welcoming. I strongly recommend this Gym!

Heres the deal... Ive lifted at UBC for the past two years without even so much as blinking an eye in the direction of Golds Gym. Today I stopped by for a personal training session with Bryan Wong (more on that later!), and was blown away by the gym. Super clean, tons of machines and weights, friendly staff... Overall, a super professional and fun environment! If youre looking for a gym with a little more space, a few more options, and a super motivating atmosphere - Golds is the place for you! The location is also super fantastic: super accessible (with amazing open hours) and conveniently located. I did an assessment with Bryan followed by a two-hour training session, and let me tell you... I am beyond DEAD! Bryan pushed me super hard, motivated me a ton, and gave me a plethora of unique pointers to utilize in my future lifts. I am super excited to incorporate what I learned with him into my routine and ultimately get stronger! Definitely work with him if you get the opportunity - you wont regret it and your muscles will be thanking you later (even if it hurts in the interim). Overall, I had such a positive experience at Golds Gym at UBC and would recommend it to anyone! Even if youre a bit skeptical, check it out! A drop-in session never hurt anyone - unless, you know, you like, actually injure yourself... (But with the super great staff present, thats not gonna happen! And also, know your limits and be safe.)

Ive been working with PT Sasha for a week now and have already seen a huge improvement in my strength and confidence in going to the gym. She modifies exercises if needed but also pushes you to work hard. I highly recommend her if you are looking for a trainer!

Golds ump is a great and welcoming place to workout and their personal trainer Ariana has helped me so much with my fitness journey. She listened to what my fitness goals were and together we crafted a workout plan that was realistic and really well thought out.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Brandon! Happy to hear you are enjoying the environment our team here. We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Well, I agree to some of the reviews here. The gym has changed over the last couple of months. At least where I gym, the management is different and the reception is nice as well. The membership plans are far simpler than what it used to be. If you do not want to become a member then you do not have to. However, the gym has been a pleasant experience for me. Some of the equipment is really fab!!!

Ive been going to this gym a little over a year now, and people who work here are always nice, kind and helpful! Especially Kyle is a manager who is very professional yet easy to communicate with. There are equipment for powerlifting, bodybuilding and weightlifting. 4 racks, 3 deadlift platforms and 2 benches, 2 incline benches so there are plenty of spots to train compound movements such as deadlift, bench press and squat. During the covid times, the employees here are doing the best job maintaining the gym clean and safe place and they are following the protocol rigidly. Trainers here are super knowledgeable and professional as well!

Great gym! Offers wide range of machines and weights and has proper covid sanitation protocols in place. Staff are all really friendly and time slots are easy to book, would definitely recommend coming here!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Shannon! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. Well be sure to let the entire team know what you said, happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Very inclusive environment that enables all athletes from all walks of life to pursue their fitness goals. Staff are highly qualified and friendly!!! Would definitely recommend to all UBC students and Staff as well as of those who live in the area. Alex Savanovic  one of the staff members at Golds was also of great assistance and was a consistent friendly face that made the gym more welcoming.

Golds Gym has been a great place to work out during this pandemic, they take all the necessary precautions. The employees have been very helpful, especially personal trainer Matthew Herbert has been great.

Must try personal training with Sasha Duncan Sasha helped me to quickly tone up, learn to deadlift properly and feel confident enough to lift free weights alone. Without her help, I d probably be hiding in the corner doing leg lifts or something. Honestly, the pandemic has really bummed me out, but training with Sasha instantly became a high point in my week. If you want a talented personal trainer that is fun enough to laugh at your jokes (but also won t let you talk your way out of your workout), I can t recommend Sasha enough.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Jackie! Happy to be your top UBC gym!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ive often struggled with committing to a workout space due to my complicated relationship with the concept of exercise.  I related my concerns when discussing whether or not to sign up for a membership at this gym, and my fears were promptly alleviated.  Cassandra calmly talked it through with me, inspired me to take the leap, and we came to a mutually beneficial conclusion. I am now quite excited to improve my fitness and improve my overall temperament towards exercise!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Cal! Happy to hear that you feel welcomed and are enjoying the atmosphere here so far. We will be sure to let Cassandra know what you said. Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: The classes are AWESOME!!! So much fun!!! Great workouts, great people, time flies by!!! Classes are for everyone from first day in the gym to super advanced as instructors give options for different levels! Get sweaty, make friends, feel good! Group Power is my favourite!!!

Fantastic gym, super friendly staff, and an incredible sponsor for our annual dance battle event on campus that raises money for a local mental health initiative. They really went above and beyond with their sponsorship package, too. Were very impressed by their level of community involvement on campus, and we really hope to work with them again in the future!

I love golds. They have all the machines and cardio equipment I need. Furthermore, the staff is extremely polite. During the pandemic, they are taking all necessary precautions in order to keep everyone safe. The manager at the UMP location is also super nice.

Ive been lifting here for nearly a year now. The facility is always clean and well maintained. The staff have always been outstanding and friendly. I would confidently say this is one of the best gyms in the Lower Mainland.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback, Niko! We are happy to hear you ve enjoyed your experience with us over the year, we re excited to watch you continue achieving your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: Ariana Zandi is one of the most dedicated and exceptional PT s I ve come across. Her expertise has helped me perfect my form, challenge myself, and become more confident in the gym. She has made my Gold s gym experience the best it can be. If you re looking for a fun and knowledgeable PT, Ariana is your girl!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Maya! We are so happy to have you part of the community. Well be sure to let Ariana know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: Gold s Gym has been a key supporter of our service fraternity, Alpha Phi Omega. They worked with us to create an excellent sponsorship package. We re so appreciative of the time they ve taken to work with us, and their dedication to being a positive influence on the community.
Very good experience overall! Ariana is an absolutely amazing trainer. She is so sweet, understanding and helpful.

I ve been going to this gym for years and more recently, signed up for personal training under Nathan Godden. With his help, I ve been able to overcome a plateau in my fitness journey and improve my overall performance. I could not have asked for a better trainer.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow! Glad to help and be your top UBC gym located in University Marketplace Joey.  Were happy Nathans helping you towards your best gym experience.

detailed_reviews.review_text: I ve been training with Bryan Wong for almost 1.5 months now and it has been quite an experience. For the longest time, I was hesitant to work on compound exercises. Bryan has really helped me work on my bench, squats and deadlifts. To me, Bryan is not just my trainer or coach, he s also my good friend and a big brother. It s good to have someone you look up to and Bryan is that person for me. Often between sets, or outside of gym, he gives me a lot of his wisdom and tips on fat loss, muscle building, nutrition or life in general. He always keeps me accountable on my goals and has instilled in me a lot of discipline. Highly recommend Bryan if you re looking for a personal trainer.

I have been doing personal training with Sasha from Golds Gym UBC for a few months now and I would highly recommend her. Sasha is a fantasic  personal trainer who is knowledgable and willing to take the time to explain in detail the mechanics of each exercise. I have seen significant improvements in my abilities and have really enjoyed my time working with her!

Covid safe, accessible and friendly staff, wide range of weights and machines. Easily the best gym on ubc campus. The sessions are an hour and 15 minutes, which gives ample time to get a nice workout in. Also a wide range of times lots available from 6:30am to 9:30pm. 10/10 recommend !
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Enzo! Happy to hear that youre enjoying your experience with us so far, glad to have you as a valued member

detailed_reviews.review_text: The classes are AWESOME!! I felt so welcomed the first time I attended a class - I was immediately helped by the instructor (Jen) as soon as I walked through the door. I recommend Group Power (weightlifting) and Ride (spin) classes for anyone interested in starting out :) I ve been going to Gold s for a year and a half now, and have been doing Mossa classes for four years without any previous experience!
