If you desire to have a personal trainer who is intelligent, approachable, resourceful, encouraging and motivating you to extend your comfort zone and achieve what you thought was impossible, meet Ian Standish at Gold s Gym at UBC. Whether you would like to tone your body or grow muscles, Ian will patiently listen to your objectives and come up with a plan that includes both diet and exercise that will get you there! My goal was to become stronger, tone my muscles and have a proportionate body that I would be proudly showing off anywhere and I achieved that! Within a few months, I can dead lift 140 pounds and I have a wonderful feeling of firmness. I am a confident person but my self-confidence grew exponentially since I have been exercising with Ian. I look forward to every workout because he is both a determined personal trainer and a wonderful person!

I used to go to the gym sporadically because of my own laziness until I started meeting the amazing staff at Golds Gym. In particular, the friendly face of Alex Savanovic always encouraged to keep pushing through the pain and show up consistently until I was happy with my body. I now get excited to go to Golds several times a week and Alex has never failed to give me the energy and passion I need to get through my workout!

Since it has been under new management since November, I have noticed a huge improvement in overall maintenance, management, and facility care. The machines are fresh and new, staff is very friendly and helpful, and I plan on renewing my membership once it has expired. Very impressed, would recommend this gym to any of my close friends.

Great equipment, great atmosphere, very clean and well kept. Safe during COVID-19 since sanitation is everywhere with disinfectant spray bottles. System is flexible with cancelling and changing sessions- very accommodating. Definetely the best gym out there at UBC.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, we re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: Golds Gym is the first gym i went to that I felt comfortable in. The staff is great, always there if you need anything and the environment is really welcoming. Cant reccomend it enough. Special thanks to Cass.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the feedback and review, Omar! Happy to hear that you are enjoying your experience so far. We will be sure to let Cass know what you said! Happy lifting

detailed_reviews.review_text: When it comes to personal training, you go in with the objective of improving your physical health. At least that was my plan, but in training with Nathan Godden it s been so much more. Not only does he cater a program specifically for your needs (a heavy emphasis on mobility in my case for working on set) but he s always available for clear communication whenever I have questions. He s helped in my progress through all facets of health and is a true professional I would never hesitate to recommend others go see.
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were really happy to hear Austin! Were proud to have top personal trainers and one of the best gyms in UBC located in University Marketplace.

detailed_reviews.review_text: Super conveniently located next to UBC. The group fitness classes are awesome! I love the friendly and motivating atmosphere, and the great community of people Ive met in classes. Group Ride and Group Power together have gotten me stronger and leaner, and I always leave class with a huge, sweaty smile on my face :)

As a single father to two young kids, it is very difficult to find the time to workout with my hectic schedule. When my friend told me about Golds I was sceptical, as I had always heard anecdotally that Golds was a gym full of muscleheads. When I finally caved and went for a workout on my day off, my expectations were completely subverted. The facility was cleanly and there were people of all levels of fitness working out. The staff were happy to engage in conversations with me and helped me figure out a plan to insert fitness back into my life. A special thanks to Matthew and the other staff for helping this father of two find time for himself again :)

In the midst of the covid pandemic, Golds gym has been able to provide me with an adequate place to workout, while still prioritizing the health of its customers! They ve been able to adapt to the new regulations and have made it easy to book sessions online. 100% recommend .

Ive had an amazing experience at Golds Gym so far. The staff, especially Alex Savanovic, are extremely friendly and create such a safe and motivating environment to work out in. Im so glad I got a membership here!!!

Great gym with super friendly and helpful staff. They were a great sponsor for our Science RXN event and went out of their way to provide an excellent sponsorship package. We hope to work with them again in the future!

Golds Gym UBC is my favourite gym in Vancouver. They have a comprehensive facility and their staff are great people. Kyle Uy, the manager,  is an up and coming prominent figure in the Vancouver fitness world. Kyle takes care of his members and staff which leads to an awesome training environment. Bryan Wong is also an amazing personal trainer that can have you making improvements within weeks of starting! Thank you GOLDS UBC!!!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your feedback! We are happy to hear you re enjoying your experience with us, well be sure to let both Kyle and Bryan know what you said! We re excited to watch you achieve your goals with us

detailed_reviews.review_text: Great gym over all. Golds Gym UMP is very clean and COVID safe. The gym has a variety of equipment to offer the members. Not to mention, the staff are wonderful!
detailed_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for the feedback, Samantha! Happy to hear youre enjoying your experience with us so far, well be sure to let the entire team know. Happy lifting!

detailed_reviews.review_text: Fantastic facility and staff. Amie and the rest of the gang do a great job in providing a friendly atmosphere in which it is easy to reach your goals and succeed. All in all, one of the best gyms Ive ever been to.
